Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Amaaleeqa asata xoonidosaappe simmiis; simmidi Xiqilaaga kataman naa77u gallassaa takkiis.

English Sentences: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto gallassi issi bitanee kayyuwau ba maayuwaa pooshshidi, ba huuphiyan buhiyaa laalidi, Saa7oola qatuwaappe yiis. Daawitakko i yiido wode, sa7an lichchi giidi ziggiis.

English Sentences: It came even to pass on the third day, that, behold, a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent, and earth upon his head: and so it was, when he came to David, that he fell to the earth, and did obeisance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti a, "Neeni awappe yaadii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i, "Taani Israa7eelatu qatuwaappe kessa ekkada yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto him, From whence comest thou? And he said unto him, Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti a, "Aibi kiyidaakko ane taayyo oda" yaagiis. Yaagin i Daawita, "Nu olanchchati olaappe baqatidosona; nu asaappe daroti haiqqidosona; qassi Saa7oolinne a na7ai Yonaataani haiqqidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto him, How went the matter? I pray thee, tell me. And he answered, That the people are fled from the battle, and many of the people also are fallen and dead; and Saul and Jonathan his son are dead also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oduwaa ehiida wodallaa Daawiti, "Saa7oolinne a na7aa Yonaataani haiqqidoogaa neeni aibin erai?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto the young man that told him, How knowest thou that Saul and Jonathan his son be dead?
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodallai, "Qaadadan taani Gilbboo7a deriyan de7ishin, Saa7ooli ba tooraa guufetidi eqqidaagaa be7aas; paraa gaaretinne paraasati Saa7oolakko matattidosona.

English Sentences: And the young man that told him said, As I happened by chance upon mount Gilboa, behold, Saul leaned upon his spear; and, lo, the chariots and horsemen followed hard after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Saa7ooli yuushshi xeellidi tana be7iis; be7idi tana xeesin taani, Yee! yaagaas.

English Sentences: And when he looked behind him, he saw me, and called unto me. And I answered, Here am I.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Saa7ooli tana, Neeni oonee? yaagidi oichchiis; oichchin, Taani Amaaleeqa asa yaagada zaaraas.

English Sentences: And he said unto me, Who art thou? And I answered him, I am an Amalekite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Saa7ooli tana, Taani keehi masunxxada, haiquwau mata uttaas; neeni ta bolli kiya eqqada tana wora yaagiis.

English Sentences: He said unto me again, Stand, I pray thee, upon me, and slay me: for anguish is come upon me, because my life is yet whole in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kunddidoogaappe guyyiyan, haiquwaappe palahennaagaa erido gishshau, taani a bolli kiya eqqada a woraas; a huuphiyan de7iya kallachchaanne a qesiyan de7iya hirbbooraa ekkada neekko ta godaakko ehaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So I stood upon him, and slew him, because I was sure that he could not live after that he was fallen: and I took the crown that was upon his head, and the bracelet that was on his arm, and have brought them hither unto my lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawitinne Daawita asai azzanidi, bantta maayuwaa dafidi pooshshidosona.

English Sentences: Then David took hold on his clothes, and rent them; and likewise all the men that were with him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Saa7ooli, Yonaataani, GODAA olanchchatinne Israa7eela asai olan wurido gishshau, omarssi gakkanaashin kayyottidosona, yeekkidosonanne xoomidosona.

English Sentences: And they mourned, and wept, and fasted until even, for Saul, and for Jonathan his son, and for the people of the LORD, and for the house of Israel; because they were fallen by the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oduwaa ehiida wodallaa Daawiti, "Neeni awa asee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i Daawita, "Taani betiyaa Amaaleeqa bitaniyaa na7a" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto the young man that told him, Whence art thou? And he answered, I am the son of a stranger, an Amalekite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti a, "GODAI tiyido kawuwaa woranau ne kushiyaa denttaidda, aissi yayyabeikkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto him, How wast thou not afraid to stretch forth thine hand to destroy the LORD's anointed?
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba asatuppe issuwaa xeesidi, "Ba; baada a wora!" yaagiis; yaagin i Amaaleeqiyaa dechchidi woriis.

English Sentences: And David called one of the young men, and said, Go near, and fall upon him. And he smote him that he died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Amaaleeqiyaa, " GODAI tiyido kawuwaa taani woraas yaagada neeni ne doonan markkattido gishshau, ne suuttaa gomee nena oiqqo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto him, Thy blood be upon thy head; for thy mouth hath testified against thee, saying, I have slain the LORD's anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Saa7oolayyoonne a na7aa Yonaataanayyo hagaadan yaagi zilaaliis.

English Sentences: And David lamented with this lamentation over Saul and over Jonathan his son:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asaikka "Wonddafiyaa" giyo ha zilaassaa tamaarana mala azaziis; ha zilaassai Yaashaara maxaafan xaafettiis.

English Sentences: (Also he bade them teach the children of Judah the use of the bow: behold, it is written in the book of Jasher.)
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nenoo Israa7eelaa, ne halaqati ne xoqqa sohotun haiqqidosona. Wolqqaamati waani kunddidonaashsha!

English Sentences: The beauty of Israel is slain upon thy high places: how are the mighty fallen!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaa Gaate kataman yootoppite; Asqqaloona ogetunkka awaajjoppite. Hegaa siyikko, Pilisxxeematu macca naati ufaittana; shaamatu macca naati Hashshu! gaana.

English Sentences: Tell it not in Gath, publish it not in the streets of Askelon; lest the daughters of the Philistines rejoice, lest the daughters of the uncircumcised triumph.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo Gilbboo7a deretoo, intte bollan iri bukkoppo; xaazikka xaazatoppo. He biittaa goshshaikka kattaa mokkoppo; aissi giikko, yan wolqqaamaa gonddallee tunabaa kiyiis; Saa7oola gonddalleekka zaitiyan qucettiyoogaa aggiis.

English Sentences: Ye mountains of Gilboa, let there be no dew, neither let there be rain, upon you, nor fields of offerings: for there the shield of the mighty is vilely cast away, the shield of Saul, as though he had not been anointed with oil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goora7ettidaageetu suuttaappenne wolqqaamatu ashuwaappe Yonaataana wonddafee guyye gibeenna. Qassi Saa7oola bisoikka kallennan simmibeenna.

English Sentences: From the blood of the slain, from the fat of the mighty, the bow of Jonathan turned not back, and the sword of Saul returned not empty.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Saa7oolinne Yonaataani asi siiqiyoogeetanne lo77iyaageeta; bantta haiquwankka bantta paxankka shaahettibookkona. Eti argganttaappekka aadhdhida eeso; gaammuwaappekka aadhdhida mino.

English Sentences: Saul and Jonathan were lovely and pleasant in their lives, and in their death they were not divided: they were swifter than eagles, they were stronger than lions.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela maccaasatoo, Saa7oolayyo, inttena zo7onne alleeqo maayuwaa maizzidaagaayyoonne worqqan intte maayuwaa alleeqissidaagaayyo yeekkite.

English Sentences: Ye daughters of Israel, weep over Saul, who clothed you in scarlet, with other delights, who put on ornaments of gold upon your apparel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wolqqaamati olan waani kunddidonaashsha! Yonaataani ne xoqqa sohotun goora7etti zin77iis.

English Sentences: How are the mighty fallen in the midst of the battle! O Jonathan, thou wast slain in thine high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ishaa Yonaataanaa, taani neeyyo azzanais; ne taayyo daroppe al77o. Neeni tana siiqiyo siiqoi garamissiyaagaa, maccaasa siiqoppekka aadhdhidi garamissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: I am distressed for thee, my brother Jonathan: very pleasant hast thou been unto me: thy love to me was wonderful, passing the love of women.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wolqqaamati waani kunddidonaashsha! Ola miishshaikka waani dippi giidee!" yaagidi Daawiti zilaaliis.

English Sentences: How are the mighty fallen, and the weapons of war perished!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti, "Yihudaa katamatuppe issuwaa boo?" yaagidi GODAA oichchiis. Oichchin GODAI a, "Ee; ba" yaagiis. Yaagin Daawiti, "Awa boo" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin i, "Kebroona ba" yaagidi zaariis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after this, that David enquired of the LORD, saying, Shall I go up into any of the cities of Judah? And the LORD said unto him, Go up. And David said, Whither shall I go up? And he said, Unto Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba maccaasata naa77ata, Iziraa7eeliyo Ahino7aamonne Qarmmeloosiyo, Naabaala am77iyo Abigaalonne ekkidi, Kebroona katamaa biis.

English Sentences: So David went up thither, and his two wives also, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail Nabal's wife the Carmelite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti banaara de7iya asatakka eta so asaa ubbaara ekki ehin, Kebroonaaninne a heeran de7iya guutta katamatun uttidosona.

English Sentences: And his men that were with him did David bring up, every man with his household: and they dwelt in the cities of Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asati Kebroona katamaa yiidi, yan eti Daawita Yihudaa asaa bolli kawoyanau tiyidosona. Saa7oola moogidaageeti Gala7aaden de7iya Yaabeesha katamaa asata gididoogaa Daawiti siyido wode,

English Sentences: And the men of Judah came, and there they anointed David king over the house of Judah. And they told David, saying, That the men of Jabeshgilead were they that buried Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: asaa kiittidi eta, "Intte intte godaa Saa7oola moogido kehatettaa gishshau, GODAI inttena anjjo.

English Sentences: And David sent messengers unto the men of Jabeshgilead, and said unto them, Blessed be ye of the LORD, that ye have shewed this kindness unto your lord, even unto Saul, and have buried him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka GODAI aggenna siiquwaanne tumatettaa inttena besso; qassi intte ha kehatettaa oottido gishshau, taanikka intteyyo lo77otettan kushiyaa zaarana.

English Sentences: And now the LORD shew kindness and truth unto you: and I also will requite you this kindness, because ye have done this thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i simmi minnite; xalite; aissi giikko, intte godai Saa7ooli haiqqiichchiis; qassi Yihudaa asati tana tiyidi, bantta bolli kawoyidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore now let your hands be strengthened, and be ye valiant: for your master Saul is dead, and also the house of Judah have anointed me king over them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola olanchchatu gadaawai Neera na7aa Abaneeri Saa7oola na7aa Yaabustta ekkidi, Maahinaima giyo sohuwaa efiis.

English Sentences: But Abner the son of Ner, captain of Saul's host, took Ishbosheth the son of Saul, and brought him over to Mahanaim;
Wolaitta Sentences: Efiidi Gala7aade, Aseera, Iziraa7eela, Efireema, Biniyaamanne Israa7eela biittaa ubbaa bollan kawoyiis.

English Sentences: And made him king over Gilead, and over the Ashurites, and over Jezreel, and over Ephraim, and over Benjamin, and over all Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7aa Yaabusttee Israa7eela bolli kawotiyo wode ayyo oitamu laitta; i naa77u laittaa kawotiis; gidikkonne, Yihudaa asai Daawita kaalliis.

English Sentences: Ishbosheth Saul's son was forty years old when he began to reign over Israel, and reigned two years. But the house of Judah followed David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Kebroonan Yihudaa asatu bolli laappun laittanne usuppun aginaa kawotiis.

English Sentences: And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neera na7aa Abaneerinne Saa7oola na7aa Yaabustte asai Maahinaimappe Gabaa7oona katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And Abner the son of Ner, and the servants of Ishbosheth the son of Saul, went out from Mahanaim to Gibeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabinne Daawita asai kiyi biidi, Gabaa7oona dalbbanttaa matan etaara gaittidosona; issi citai dalbbanttaappe hefintta baggaara uttin, issi citai hafintta baggaara uttidosona.

English Sentences: And Joab the son of Zeruiah, and the servants of David, went out, and met together by the pool of Gibeon: and they sat down, the one on the one side of the pool, and the other on the other side of the pool.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Abaneeri Yoo7aaba, "Ane wodallati denddidi, nu sinttan olaa gaittona" yaagiis. Yaagin Yoo7aabi, "Eeno, denddidi gaittona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Abner said to Joab, Let the young men now arise, and play before us. And Joab said, Let them arise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Biniyaama baggaunne Saa7oola na7aa Yaabustte baggau tammanne naa77u asati qoodan kiyidi, Daawita baggau eqqida tammanne naa77u asatuura olaa gaittidosona.

English Sentences: Then there arose and went over by number twelve of Benjamin, which pertained to Ishbosheth the son of Saul, and twelve of the servants of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaittidi issoi issuwaa huuphiyaa oiqqidi, ba oiqqidoogaa daaddan daaddan bisuwaa dirgginttidi, issippe haiqqidosona; hegaa gishshau, Gabaa7oonan de7iya he sohoi Bisuwaa Gade geetettees.

English Sentences: And they caught every one his fellow by the head, and thrust his sword in his fellow's side; so they fell down together: wherefore that place was called Helkathhazzurim, which is in Gibeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi wolqqaama olai olettin, Daawita asai Abaneeranne Israa7eela asaanne xooniis.

English Sentences: And there was a very sore battle that day; and Abner was beaten, and the men of Israel, before the servants of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi naati heezzai Yoo7aabi, Abishaayinne Asaaheeli he sohuwan de7oosona; Asaaheeli wushadan eesotidi woxxees.

English Sentences: And there were three sons of Zeruiah there, Joab, and Abishai, and Asahel: and Asahel was as light of foot as a wild roe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaaheeli ushachchi woikko haddirssi geennan Abaneera yedetaa sikkiis.

English Sentences: And Asahel pursued after Abner; and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri guyye simmi xeellidi, "Asaaheelaa, laa nenee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Asaaheeli, "Ee tana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Abner looked behind him, and said, Art thou Asahel? And he answered, I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Abaneeri a, "Issi baggi, ushachchi woikko haddirssi simma; simmada asatuppe issuwaa oiqqada a ola miishshaa qaara ekka" yaagiis; shin Asaaheeli a gooddiyoogaa agganau koyibeenna.

English Sentences: And Abner said to him, Turn thee aside to thy right hand or to thy left, and lay thee hold on one of the young men, and take thee his armour. But Asahel would not turn aside from following of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Abaneeri Asaaheela, "Taani nena biittaara gattada sikkennan de7ishin, tana gooddiyoogaa agga! Nena worada, taani ne ishaa Yoo7aaba som77uwaa waatada xeellanee?" yaagidi seeriis.

English Sentences: And Abner said again to Asahel, Turn thee aside from following me: wherefore should I smite thee to the ground? how then should I hold up my face to Joab thy brother?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Asaaheeli a gooddiyoogaa aggennan ixxiis. Hegaa gishshau, Abaneeri tooraa guyye tum77idi, Asaaheela uluwaa caddiis; caddin toorai zokkuwaara kantti kiyiis; Asaaheeli he sohuwankka kunddidi haiqqiis. Asaaheeli haiqqido sohuwaa gakkida asai ubbai hegan eqqiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit he refused to turn aside: wherefore Abner with the hinder end of the spear smote him under the fifth rib, that the spear came out behind him; and he fell down there, and died in the same place: and it came to pass, that as many as came to the place where Asahel fell down and died stood still.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yoo7aabinne Abishaayi Abaneera gooddidosona; awai wulliyo wode, Gabaa7oona Bazzuwaa efiya ogiyan Giiyaaha katamaappe sintta baggaara de7iya Ama giyo keraa kiyidosona.

English Sentences: Joab also and Abishai pursued after Abner: and the sun went down when they were come to the hill of Ammah, that lieth before Giah by the way of the wilderness of Gibeon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama asati Abaneera guyyen shiiqidosona; eti issi cita gididi, issi keraa huuphiyan eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Benjamin gathered themselves together after Abner, and became one troop, and stood on the top of an hill.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abaneeri Yoo7aaba xeesidi, "Merinau olettiiddi de7aneeyye? Hagaa wurssettai camo gidanaagaa neeni erikkii? Ne asata, Intte ishantta gooddiyoogaa aggite geennan aude gattuutee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Abner called to Joab, and said, Shall the sword devour for ever? knowest thou not that it will be bitterness in the latter end? how long shall it be then, ere thou bid the people return from following their brethren?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yoo7aabi Abaneera, "Xoossai ero! Neeni haasayennan aggidabaa gidiyaakko, ta asai ba ishantta sa7ai wonttana gakkanaashin gooddana shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joab said, As God liveth, unless thou hadst spoken, surely then in the morning the people had gone up every one from following his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yoo7aabi malkkataa punniis; punnin asai ubbai eqqiis. Israa7eelatakka zaarettidi gooddibookkona woikko olibookkona.

English Sentences: So Joab blew a trumpet, and all the people stood still, and pursued after Israel no more, neither fought they any more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneerinne a asai he gallassa qammaa ubbaa salppiyan Aaraba garaara biidosona; biidi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidosona. Pinnidi, maalladoora hemettidi Maahinaima simmidosona.

English Sentences: And Abner and his men walked all that night through the plain, and passed over Jordan, and went through all Bithron, and they came to Mahanaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi Abaneera gooddiyoogaa aggi bayidi, ba asa ubbaa issi sohuwaa shiishshiis; shiishshidi xeelliyo wode, Asaaheeli bainnan Daawita asaappe tammanne uddufun asai pacciis.

English Sentences: And Joab returned from following Abner: and when he had gathered all the people together, there lacked of David's servants nineteen men and Asahel.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Daawita asai Abaneera asaappenne Biniyaama zaretuppe heezzu xeetanne usuppun tammu asata woridosona.

English Sentences: But the servants of David had smitten of Benjamin, and of Abner's men, so that three hundred and threescore men died.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaaheela ahaa ekkidi, Beetaliheeme kataman de7iya a aawaa duufuwan moogidosona; Yoo7aabinne a asai qammaa hemettiiddi aqidosona; sa7ai wonttishin Kebroona katamaa gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And they took up Asahel, and buried him in the sepulchre of his father, which was in Bethlehem. And Joab and his men went all night, and they came to Hebron at break of day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola asainne Daawita asai daro wodiyaa olettidosona; Daawiti olan minni minnidi biyo wode, Saa7oola asai laafi laafidi bees.

English Sentences: Now there was long war between the house of Saul and the house of David: but David waxed stronger and stronger, and the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona kataman Daawitayyo naati yelettidosona; Iziraa7eeliyaa Ahino7aama yelido baira na7ai Aminoona;

English Sentences: And unto David were sons born in Hebron: and his firstborn was Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qarmmeloosiyaa Naabaala am77iyaa Abigaala yelido na7ai Kil77aabi naa77antto; Gashuura Kawuwaa Talmmaaya na7iyaa Maa7ika yelido Abeseloomi heezzantto.

English Sentences: And his second, Chileab, of Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite; and the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur;
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddanttoi Haggiiti na7aa Adooniyaa; ichchashanttoi Abiixaali na7aa SHafaaxiyaa.

English Sentences: And the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppunttoi Daawita keettaayee Egili na7aa Yitira7aama; ha naati ubbai Kebroonan Daawitayyo yelettidosona.

English Sentences: And the sixth, Ithream, by Eglah David's wife. These were born to David in Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola asaaranne Daawita asaara olettiyo wode, Abaneeri Saa7oola asatu giddon minni minnidi biis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, while there was war between the house of Saul and the house of David, that Abner made himself strong for the house of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oolassi Aaya na7iyaa Rixifo giyo issi baakkiyaa de7ausu; Yaabusttee Abaneera, "Ta aawaa baakkeera aissi aqadii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And Saul had a concubine, whose name was Rizpah, the daughter of Aiah: and Ishbosheth said to Abner, Wherefore hast thou gone in unto my father's concubine?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri a haasayan daro yiillotidi Yaabustta, "Tana neeni Yihudaa kana huuphe gaadiiyye? Hachchi taani ne aawaa Saa7oolayyo, a ishanttuyyoonne a dabbotuyyo ammanettais; taani nena Daawita kushiyan aattada immabeikke. SHin ha77i neeni tana ha mishiree gaasuwan mootaasa!

English Sentences: Then was Abner very wroth for the words of Ishbosheth, and said, Am I a dog's head, which against Judah do shew kindness this day unto the house of Saul thy father, to his brethren, and to his friends, and have not delivered thee into the hand of David, that thou chargest me to day with a fault concerning this woman?
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola zariyaappe kawotettaa wotti ekkidi, Israa7eela zawan Daanappe biidi Berssaabeha gakkanaashin,

English Sentences: So do God to Abner, and more also, except, as the LORD hath sworn to David, even so I do to him;
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela bollinne Yihudaa bolli, Daawita kawotettaa essanau GODAI maaci wottido ha yohuwaa taani oottana xayikko, Xoossai Abaneera gufantto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: To translate the kingdom from the house of Saul, and to set up the throne of David over Israel and over Judah, from Dan even to Beersheba.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabusttee Abaneerayyo yayyido gishshau, hara qaala qaattibeenna.

English Sentences: And he could not answer Abner a word again, because he feared him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri Kebroonan de7iya Daawitakko, "Biittai oossee? Neeni tanaara maachchaa maacetta; Israa7eela asai ubbai neekko simmanaadan taani nena maaddana" yaagidi kiitaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Abner sent messengers to David on his behalf, saying, Whose is the land? saying also, Make thy league with me, and, behold, my hand shall be with thee, to bring about all Israel unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti, "Lo77o! Taani nenaara maachchaa wottana. SHin taani nena issibaa oichchais; neeni tana be7anau yiyo wode, Saa7oola na7iyo Miikaalo taayyo ekkennan yooppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Well; I will make a league with thee: but one thing I require of thee, that is, Thou shalt not see my face, except thou first bring Michal Saul's daughter, when thou comest to see my face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Saa7oola na7aa Yaabusttekko kiittidi, "Xeetu Pilisxxematu qaaratuwaa cilooshada ekkido ta maccaasiyo Miikaalo tau imma" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David sent messengers to Ishbosheth Saul's son, saying, Deliver me my wife Michal, which I espoused to me for an hundred foreskins of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yaabusttee kiitaa yeddidi, i keettaawaa Laawisha na7aa Palxxi7eelappe wotti ekkidi ehiissiis.

English Sentences: And Ishbosheth sent, and took her from her husband, even from Phaltiel the son of Laish.
Wolaitta Sentences: I keettaawai Baahuriima katamaa gakkanaassi yeekkiiddi i geeduwaa kaalliis; kaallin Abaneeri a, "Guyye simmada so ba" yaagiis; yaagin bitanee guyye simmidi biis.

English Sentences: And her husband went with her along weeping behind her to Bahurim. Then said Abner unto him, Go, return. And he returned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri Israa7eela cimatukko biidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Daawiti intte bolli kawotana mala, daro wodiyaa amottideta;

English Sentences: And Abner had communication with the elders of Israel, saying, Ye sought for David in times past to be king over you:
Wolaitta Sentences: ane hekko ha77i polite! Aissi giikko, GODAI, Ta asaa Israa7eela, taani Pilisxxeema asatu kushiyaappenne eta morkke ubbatu kushiyaappe ta ashkkaraa Daawita baggaara ashshana giidoogaa hassayite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now then do it: for the LORD hath spoken of David, saying, By the hand of my servant David I will save my people Israel out of the hand of the Philistines, and out of the hand of all their enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri Biniyaama zaretuyyo dumma haasayiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asainne Biniyaama asai ubbai oottanau koyido ubbabaa Daawitayyo yootanau Kebroona katamaa biis.

English Sentences: And Abner also spake in the ears of Benjamin: and Abner went also to speak in the ears of David in Hebron all that seemed good to Israel, and that seemed good to the whole house of Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri banaara laatamu asata ekkidi, Kebroona katamaa bin, Daawiti ayyoonne a asaayyo imatuwaa makkiis.

English Sentences: So Abner came to David to Hebron, and twenty men with him. And David made Abner and the men that were with him a feast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Abaneeri Daawita, "Eti nenaara maachchaa maacettanaadaaninne ne wozanai amottiyo ubbaa haaranaadan, taani baada Israa7eela asaa ubbaa kawuwaassi ta godaassi shiishshais" yaagiis; yaagin Daawiti Abaneera moissidi saro yeddiis.

English Sentences: And Abner said unto David, I will arise and go, and will gather all Israel unto my lord the king, that they may make a league with thee, and that thou mayest reign over all that thine heart desireth. And David sent Abner away; and he went in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Daawita asainne Yoo7aabi olaappe darobaa omooddidi simmidosona; shin Abaneeri Kebroona kataman Daawitaara de7enna; aissi giikko, Daawiti yeddin i saro biichchiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, the servants of David and Joab came from pursuing a troop, and brought in a great spoil with them: but Abner was not with David in Hebron; for he had sent him away, and he was gone in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabinne aara de7iya olanchchati gakkiyo wode, asai Yoo7aaba, "Neera na7aa Abaneeri kawuwaa Daawitakko yin, kawoi a yeddin, i saro biis" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: When Joab and all the host that was with him were come, they told Joab, saying, Abner the son of Ner came to the king, and he hath sent him away, and he is gone in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yoo7aabi kawuwaakko biidi, "Waanadii! Abaneeri neekko yin, aibissi saro yeddadii? Hekko i biichchiis!

English Sentences: Then Joab came to the king, and said, What hast thou done? behold, Abner came unto thee; why is it that thou hast sent him away, and he is quite gone?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neera na7ai Abaneeri nena cimmanau, neeni geliyoosaanne kiyiyoosaa be7anaunne neeni oottiyo ubbabaa eranau yiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Thou knowest Abner the son of Ner, that he came to deceive thee, and to know thy going out and thy coming in, and to know all that thou doest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi Daawita sinttappe kiyidi, Abaneera geeduwaa kiitaa yeddiis; yeddin eti a Siira haatta ollaa lanqqeppe guyye zaaridosona; shin Daawiti ha yohuwaa erenna.

English Sentences: And when Joab was come out from David, he sent messengers after Abner, which brought him again from the well of Sirah: but David knew it not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri Kebroona katamaa guyye simmidi yiido wode, Yoo7aabi aara dumma haasayanabaadan dirssaa pengge a ekkidi efiis; ba ishaa Asaaheela suuttaa achchanau Abaneera uluwaa caddiis; caddin Abaneeri he sohuwan haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And when Abner was returned to Hebron, Joab took him aside in the gate to speak with him quietly, and smote him there under the fifth rib, that he died, for the blood of Asahel his brother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ha yohuwaa siyidoogaappe guyyiyan, "Taaninne ta kawotettai Neera na7aa Abaneera suuttan GODAA sinttan merinaukka ashettokko.

English Sentences: And afterward when David heard it, he said, I and my kingdom are guiltless before the LORD for ever from the blood of Abner the son of Ner:
Wolaitta Sentences: A suuttai Yoo7aabanne a aawaa so asaa ubbaa achcho; uzuuziya cittoi de7iyo asi, woikko gogai keehippe sakkiyo asi, woikko wobbiya asi, woikko bison haiqqiya asi, woikko namisettida asi Yoo7aaba zariyan mulekka xayoppo!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Let it rest on the head of Joab, and on all his father's house; and let there not fail from the house of Joab one that hath an issue, or that is a leper, or that leaneth on a staff, or that falleth on the sword, or that lacketh bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Gabaa7oona kataman kiyida olan bantta ishaa Asaaheela Abaneeri worido gishshau, Yoo7aabinne a ishaa Abishaayi Abaneera woridosona.

English Sentences: So Joab and Abishai his brother slew Abner, because he had slain their brother Asahel at Gibeon in the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Yoo7aabanne aara de7iya asa ubbaa, "Intte maayuwaa pooshshite; maaqiyaa maayite; Abaneera halaa sinttan hemettiiddi yeekkite" yaagiis. Kawoi Daawiti halaa kaallidi biis.

English Sentences: And David said to Joab, and to all the people that were with him, Rend your clothes, and gird you with sackcloth, and mourn before Abner. And king David himself followed the bier.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abaneeri Kebroonan moogettiis; kawoi ba qaalaa xoqqissidi duufuwan yeekkiis; asai ubbaikka yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And they buried Abner in Hebron: and the king lifted up his voice, and wept at the grave of Abner; and all the people wept.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Abaneerayyo, "Abaneeri eeya asadan haiqqanau bessii?

English Sentences: And the king lamented over Abner, and said, Died Abner as a fool dieth?
Wolaitta Sentences: A kushee qashettibeenna; a tohoikka sanssalatan qashettibeenna. Asi iita asatu kushiyan haiqqiyoogaadan i haiqqiis" yaagidi zilaaliis. Asai ubbai Abaneerayyo zaarettidikka yeekkiis.

English Sentences: Thy hands were not bound, nor thy feet put into fetters: as a man falleth before wicked men, so fellest thou. And all the people wept again over him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai poo7o de7ishin, Daawiti oittaa maanaadan shoobbanau asai ubbai akko yiis; shin Daawiti, "Awa aifee wullennan de7ishin, oitta woikko harabaa baara be7ikko, Xoossai tana woro" yaagidi caaqqiis.

English Sentences: And when all the people came to cause David to eat meat while it was yet day, David sware, saying, So do God to me, and more also, if I taste bread, or ought else, till the sun be down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi oottidobaa asai ubbai be7idi ufaittiis; tumukka kawoi oottido ubbabai asa ubbaa ufaissiis.

English Sentences: And all the people took notice of it, and it pleased them: as whatsoever the king did pleased all the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, he gallassi Daawita asai ubbainne Israa7eela asai ubbai kawoi Neera na7aa Abaneera worissibeennaagaa akeekidosona.

English Sentences: For all the people and all Israel understood that day that it was not of the king to slay Abner the son of Ner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi ba ashkkarata hagaadan yaagiis; "Israa7eela biittan gita asinne halaqi haiqqidoogaa intte akeekekketii?

English Sentences: And the king said unto his servants, Know ye not that there is a prince and a great man fallen this day in Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossai tiyido kawo gidikkokka, hachchi taayyo miyyee pacciis. Hageeti Xaruuyi naati taayyo minnidosona; iitaa oottidaageetuyyo GODAI eta oosuwaadan zaaro" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I am this day weak, though anointed king; and these men the sons of Zeruiah be too hard for me: the LORD shall reward the doer of evil according to his wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7ai Yaabusttee Abaneeri Kebroonan haiqqidoogaa siyido wode, a wozanai taahiis; Israa7eela asai ubbaikka dagammiis.

English Sentences: And when Saul's son heard that Abner was dead in Hebron, his hands were feeble, and all the Israelites were troubled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7aa Yaabustteyyo ambbaanota kaalettiya naa77u halaqati de7oosona; issuwaa sunttai Ba7aana; hinkkuwaa sunttai Rekaaba; eti Biniyaama zare gidiya Ba7erootiyaa Rimmoona naata. Ba7eroota katamai Biniyaama baggadan qoodettees;

English Sentences: And Saul's son had two men that were captains of bands: the name of the one was Baanah, and the name of the other Rechab, the sons of Rimmon a Beerothite, of the children of Benjamin: (for Beeroth also was reckoned to Benjamin.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, Ba7erootan de7ida koiro asati Gittaima biitti baqatidi, heedeesappe hachchi gakkanau betedan yan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And the Beerothites fled to Gittaim, and were sojourners there until this day.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7aa Yonaataanayyo naa77u tohoi silido na7ai de7ees; Saa7oolanne Yonaataana woree Iziraa7eelappe gakkido wode, i ichchashu laitta na7a; he na7aa dichchiyaara a ekkada baqataasu; shin a baqatanau dirbbishin, na7ai kunddidi sila kiyiis; he na7aa sunttai Mafibosheeta.

English Sentences: And Jonathan, Saul's son, had a son that was lame of his feet. He was five years old when the tidings came of Saul and Jonathan out of Jezreel, and his nurse took him up, and fled: and it came to pass, as she made haste to flee, that he fell, and became lame. And his name was Mephibosheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba7erootiyaa Rimmoona naati Rekaabinne Ba7aani Yaabustte so baanau kiyidosona; eti biidi seeta gallassi gakkidosona; gakkiyo wode, i awaappe shemppees.

English Sentences: And the sons of Rimmon the Beerothite, Rechab and Baanah, went, and came about the heat of the day to the house of Ishbosheth, who lay on a bed at noon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kariyaa naagiya mishiriyaa gisttiyaa punnishin, xiskkoi oiqqin zin77aasu; Rekaabinne a ishaa Ba7aani leelan Yaabusttee zin77iyoosaa gelidosona.

English Sentences: And they came thither into the midst of the house, as though they would have fetched wheat; and they smote him under the fifth rib: and Rechab and Baanah his brother escaped.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti soo geliyo wode, Yaabusttee qol77on arssan zin77idaagaa demmidi, a uluwaa caddidi woridosona; woridi a qooriyaappe muucidosona; muucido huuphiyaa ekkidi, Aaraba garaara efiya ogiyaa oiqqidi, qammaa ubbaa hemettidosona.

English Sentences: For when they came into the house, he lay on his bed in his bedchamber, and they smote him, and slew him, and beheaded him, and took his head, and gat them away through the plain all night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaabustte huuphiyaa Kebroonan de7iya Daawitau ehiidosona; ehiidi kawuwaa, "Nena woranau koyida ne morkkiyaa Saa7oola na7aa Yaabustte huuphiyaa hagaa be7a; Saa7oola bollaaninne a naatu bollan kawuwaa nu godaa haluwaa Xoossai hachchi kessiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they brought the head of Ishbosheth unto David to Hebron, and said to the king, Behold the head of Ishbosheth the son of Saul thine enemy, which sought thy life; and the LORD hath avenged my lord the king this day of Saul, and of his seed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Ba7erootiyaa Rimmoona naata Rekaabanne a ishaa Ba7aana Daawiti hagaadan yaagiis; "Meto ubbaappe tana ashshida GODAI ero!

English Sentences: And David answered Rechab and Baanah his brother, the sons of Rimmon the Beerothite, and said unto them, As the LORD liveth, who hath redeemed my soul out of all adversity,
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi bitanee taakko yiidi, mishiraachcho odiyaabaadan, Saa7ooli haiqqiis yaagidi taayyo yootin, taani a Xiqilaagan oiqqada worissaas; taani a mishiraachchuwaassi immido woitoi hegaa.

English Sentences: When one told me, saying, Behold, Saul is dead, thinking to have brought good tidings, I took hold of him, and slew him in Ziklag, who thought that I would have given him a reward for his tidings:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba son ba arssan zin77ida xillo bitaniyaa worida iita asatuyyo a haluwaa kessiyoogee ai keenaa iitanddeeshsha! A suuttaa taani intte kushiyaappe ha77i achchana; inttena taani biittaa bollappe xaissana!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: How much more, when wicked men have slain a righteous person in his own house upon his bed? shall I not therefore now require his blood of your hand, and take you away from the earth?
Wolaitta Sentences: Rekaabanne Ba7aana woranaadan Daawiti ba olanchchata azaziis; azazin olanchchati eta woridosona; eta kushiyaanne tohuwaa qanxxirggidi, dalbbantta haattaa matan Kebroona kataman kaqqidosona. Yaabustte huuphiyaa ekki efiidi, Abaneera duufuwan Kebroonan moogidosona.

English Sentences: And David commanded his young men, and they slew them, and cut off their hands and their feet, and hanged them up over the pool in Hebron. But they took the head of Ishbosheth, and buried it in the sepulchre of Abner in Hebron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela zare ubbati Daawitakko Kebroona katamaa yiidi, "Nuuni ne ashonne ne suutta.

English Sentences: Then came all the tribes of Israel to David unto Hebron, and spake, saying, Behold, we are thy bone and thy flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase Saa7ooli nuuyyo kawo gididi de7iyo wodekka, Israa7eela asaa olau kaalettidai nena. GODAI nena, Neeni ta asaa Israa7eela heemmana; neeni eta bolli kawotana yaagi wottiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Also in time past, when Saul was king over us, thou wast he that leddest out and broughtest in Israel: and the LORD said to thee, Thou shalt feed my people Israel, and thou shalt be a captain over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Israa7eela cimati ubbai Daawitakko Kebroona katamaa yiidosona; yin i etaara Kebroonan GODAA sinttan maachchaa maacettiis; Israa7eela bolli kawotanaadan Daawita eti tiyidosona.

English Sentences: So all the elders of Israel came to the king to Hebron; and king David made a league with them in Hebron before the LORD: and they anointed David king over Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti kawotiyo wode ayyo hasttamu laitta; oitamu laittaa i kawotiis.

English Sentences: David was thirty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned forty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kebroona kataman Yihudaa bolli laappun laittanne usuppun agina i kawotiis; Yerusalaamen Israa7eela ubbatu bollinne Yihudaa bolli hasttamanne heezzu laittaa kawotiis.

English Sentences: In Hebron he reigned over Judah seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years over all Israel and Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen de7iya Yaabuusa asata olanau Daawitinne Daawita asai biidosona; Yaabuusa asati, "Daawiti ha katamaa gelanau danddayenna" giidi qoppidosona. Yaatidi eti a, "Neeni ha sohuwaa gelakka; harai attoshin, qooqetinne wobbeti nena teqqanau danddayoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the king and his men went to Jerusalem unto the Jebusites, the inhabitants of the land: which spake unto David, saying, Except thou take away the blind and the lame, thou shalt not come in hither: thinking, David cannot come in hither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, Daawiti Xiyoonen de7iya eta qatuwaa oiqqiis; oiqqin Xiyoonee Daawita Katamaa geetettiis.

English Sentences: Nevertheless David took the strong hold of Zion: the same is the city of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Daawiti ba asaa, "Yaabuusa asata xooniya asi ooninne Daawita morkketi, he wobbetinne qooqeti de7iyoosaa gakkanau, haattai goggidi kiyiyo xoo7iyaara gelanau koshshees" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, "Qooqetinne wobbeti kawo keettaa gelokkona" geetettiis.

English Sentences: And David said on that day, Whosoever getteth up to the gutter, and smiteth the Jebusites, and the lame and the blind, that are hated of David's soul, he shall be chief and captain. Wherefore they said, The blind and the lame shall not come into the house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti he qatuwaa oiqqidi, yan de7iis; he qatuwaa Daawita Katamaa yaagidi sunttiis. Daawiti Miilloppe doommidi, he katamaa yuushshi aattidi gimbbissiis.

English Sentences: So David dwelt in the fort, and called it the city of David. And David built round about from Millo and inward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI Xoossai aara de7iyo gishshau, Daawiti minni minnidi biis.

English Sentences: And David went on, and grew great, and the LORD God of hosts was with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiiroosa Kawoi Kiiraami Daawitayyo asa kiittiis. Kiittiiddi zigaa mudettaa, anaaxetanne shuchchaa massiyaageeta ayyo yeddiis; yeddin asati Daawitayyo keettaa keexxidosona.

English Sentences: And Hiram king of Tyre sent messengers to David, and cedar trees, and carpenters, and masons: and they built David an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Israa7eela bolli a kawo oottidi essidoogaanne ba asaa Israa7eela gishshau a kawotettaa xoqqu oottidi bonchchidoogaa Daawiti eriis.

English Sentences: And David perceived that the LORD had established him king over Israel, and that he had exalted his kingdom for his people Israel's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Kebroonappe Yerusalaame yiidoogaappe guyyiyan, hara baakkotanne hara maccaasata gujjidi ekkiis. Ekkin hara macca naatinne attuma naati ayyo yelettidosona.

English Sentences: And David took him more concubines and wives out of Jerusalem, after he was come from Hebron: and there were yet sons and daughters born to David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yan ayyo yelettida attuma naatu sunttai SHaamu7a, SHobaaba, Naataana, Solomona,

English Sentences: And these be the names of those that were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shammuah, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yibihaara, Elishuu7a, Nefega, Yaafi7a,

English Sentences: Ibhar also, and Elishua, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Elishamaa7a, Eliyadaa7anne Elifeleexa.

English Sentences: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphalet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Israa7eela bolli kawo gididi tiyettidoogaa Pilisxxeema asati siyido wode, eti ubbai Daawita koyanau kiyidosona; shin Daawiti hegaa siyidi, duge qatuwaa biis.

English Sentences: But when the Philistines heard that they had anointed David king over Israel, all the Philistines came up to seek David; and David heard of it, and went down to the hold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati qassikka biidi, Rafaima Wombban laalettidi uttidosona.

English Sentences: The Philistines also came and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti GODAA, "Taani baada Pilisxxeemata oloo? Neeni eta taayyo aatta immuutee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin GODAI Daawita, "Ee ola. Taani eta neeyyo aatta immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David enquired of the LORD, saying, Shall I go up to the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the LORD said unto David, Go up: for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti Ba7aali-Paraaxiima giyoosaa biidi, yan eta xooniis. Yaatidi Daawiti, "Haattaa di7oi xuussi kanttiyoogaadan GODAI ta morkketu giddoora tana kanttissiis" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, he sohuwaa sunttai Ba7aali-Paraaxiima geetettiis.

English Sentences: And David came to Baalperazim, and David smote them there, and said, The LORD hath broken forth upon mine enemies before me, as the breach of waters. Therefore he called the name of that place Baalperazim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati bantta eeqata he sohuwan yeggidi biidosona. Yaatin Daawitinne a asai he eeqata ekkidi efiidosona.

English Sentences: And there they left their images, and David and his men burned them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeemati guyye simmidi biidi, naa77anttuwaakka Rafaima Wombban laaletti uttidosona.

English Sentences: And the Philistines came up yet again, and spread themselves in the valley of Rephaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti GODAA naa77anttuwakka oichchin, GODAI a, "Sitti gaada pude eta bolli booppa; eta guyyeera yuuya aadhdhada, ettaappe sintta baggaara olanau giiga.

English Sentences: And when David enquired of the LORD, he said, Thou shalt not go up; but fetch a compass behind them, and come upon them over against the mulberry trees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ettaa huuphiyan salppiyaa cenggurssaa neeni siyiyo wode eesota. Aissi giikko, hegee Pilisxxeema olanchchata shocanau GODAI neeppe sinttau aadhdhiis giyoogaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And let it be, when thou hearest the sound of a going in the tops of the mulberry trees, that then thou shalt bestir thyself: for then shall the LORD go out before thee, to smite the host of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti GODAI azazidoogaadan oottiis; Gebaa7appe biidi Gezeera gakkanaashin, Pilisxxeema olanchchata Daawiti woriis.

English Sentences: And David did so, as the LORD had commanded him; and smote the Philistines from Geba until thou come to Gazer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela giddoppe doorettida hasttamu sha7u asata Daawiti naa77anttuwaa xeesidi shiishshiis.

English Sentences: Again, David gathered together all the chosen men of Israel, thirty thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiishshidi inne a asai ubbai Yihudan de7iya Ba7aala katamaappe denddidi, kiruubetuppe gidduwan ba kawotaa araataa bolli uttida Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA sunttan xeesettida Xoossaa Taabootaa yaappe ehaanau biidosona.

English Sentences: And David arose, and went with all the people that were with him from Baale of Judah, to bring up from thence the ark of God, whose name is called by the name of the LORD of hosts that dwelleth between the cherubims.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa Taabootaa ooratta gaariyan wottidi, keraa huuphiyan de7iya Abinadaaba sooppe ehiidosona; Abinadaaba naati Uzzinne Ahiyyoi ooratta gaariyaa kaalettoosona.

English Sentences: And they set the ark of God upon a new cart, and brought it out of the house of Abinadab that was in Gibeah: and Uzzah and Ahio, the sons of Abinadab, drave the new cart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keraa huuphiyan de7iya Abinadaaba sooppe Xoossaa Taabootaa ehiyo wode, Ahiyyoi Taabootaappe sinttaara hemettees.

English Sentences: And they brought it out of the house of Abinadab which was at Gibeah, accompanying the ark of God: and Ahio went before the ark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawitinne Israa7eela asai ubbai diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi, karaabiyaa baqqiiddinne daalaanne shaashooraa qaattiiddi, banttau kumetta wolqqan GODAA sinttan ufaittiiddi bonchchidosona.

English Sentences: And David and all the house of Israel played before the LORD on all manner of instruments made of fir wood, even on harps, and on psalteries, and on timbrels, and on cornets, and on cymbals.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naakona kattaa qoxxiyo audiyaa gakkiyo wode, boorati xubettin, Uzzi ba kushiyaa yeddidi, Xoossaa Taabootaa oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And when they came to Nachon's threshingfloor, Uzzah put forth his hand to the ark of God, and took hold of it; for the oxen shook it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Uzzi Taabootaa bochchido gishshau, GODAA hanqqoi Uzza bolli eexxi kiyiis. Xoossai a shocin, he sohuwankka Xoossaa Taabootaa matan i haiqqi aggiis.

English Sentences: And the anger of the LORD was kindled against Uzzah; and God smote him there for his error; and there he died by the ark of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA hanqqoi Uzza shocido gishshau, Daawiti yiillotiis. He sohoi hachchi gakkanaashin, Uzzi SHocettosaa geetettees.

English Sentences: And David was displeased, because the LORD had made a breach upon Uzzah: and he called the name of the place Perezuzzah to this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Daawiti GODAAYYO yayyidi, "GODAA Taabootai taakko simmi waani yaanee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David was afraid of the LORD that day, and said, How shall the ark of the LORD come to me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti GODAA Taabootaa banaara Daawita Katamaa ehaanau koyibeenna; hegaa aggidi Gaatiyaa Obeedi-Eedooma giyo bitaniyaa so efiis.

English Sentences: So David would not remove the ark of the LORD unto him into the city of David: but David carried it aside into the house of Obededom the Gittite.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Taabootai Obeedi-Eedooma son heezzu agina gam77iis; GODAI anne a soo asa ubbaa anjjiis.

English Sentences: And the ark of the LORD continued in the house of Obededom the Gittite three months: and the LORD blessed Obededom, and all his household.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe simmin, "Xoossaa Taabootaa gishshau, GODAI Obeedi-Eedooma so asaanne ayyo de7iya ubbabaa anjjiis" yaagiyoogaa Kawoi Daawiti siyiis; hegaa gishshau, Daawiti Obeedi-Eedooma soo biidi, Xoossaa Taabootaa Daawita Katamaa ufaissan ehiis.

English Sentences: And it was told king David, saying, The LORD hath blessed the house of Obededom, and all that pertaineth unto him, because of the ark of God. So David went and brought up the ark of God from the house of Obededom into the city of David with gladness.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Taabootaa tookkida asati usuppunaa tanggido paiduwan paiduwan eta essidi, issi korimaanne issi anqqara maraa Daawiti yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And it was so, that when they that bare the ark of the LORD had gone six paces, he sacrificed oxen and fatlings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti liinuwaa giyo qacinaappe dadettida eefuudiyaa maayidi, bau de7iya wolqqa ubban GODAA sinttan duriis.

English Sentences: And David danced before the LORD with all his might; and David was girded with a linen ephod.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inne Israa7eela asati ubbati ufaissan hombbociiddinne malkkataa punniiddi GODAA Taabootaa Daawita Katamaa ehiidosona.

English Sentences: So David and all the house of Israel brought up the ark of the LORD with shouting, and with the sound of the trumpet.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA Taabootai Daawita Katamaa geliyo wode, Saa7oola na7iyaa Miikaala maskkootiyaara xeellada, Kawoi Daawiti GODAA sinttan guppishiininne durishin be7aasu; be7ada Daawita ba wozanan karaasu.

English Sentences: And as the ark of the LORD came into the city of David, Michal Saul's daughter looked through a window, and saw king David leaping and dancing before the LORD; and she despised him in her heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti GODAA Taabootaa wottanau tolido dunkkaaniyaa giddon Taabootaa ehiidi wottidosona; wottin Daawiti xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa GODAAYYO yarshshiis.

English Sentences: And they brought in the ark of the LORD, and set it in his place, in the midst of the tabernacle that David had pitched for it: and David offered burnt offerings and peace offerings before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoogaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA sunttan asaa anjjiis.

English Sentences: And as soon as David had made an end of offering burnt offerings and peace offerings, he blessed the people in the name of the LORD of hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anjjidi Israa7eela asau ubbau, maccau attumau huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi komppo oittaa, issi issi muxo ashuwaanne woiniyaa teeraa melaappe issi issi lichchakkuwaa gishiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan asai ubbai ba soo ba soo simmiis.

English Sentences: And he dealt among all the people, even among the whole multitude of Israel, as well to the women as men, to every one a cake of bread, and a good piece of flesh, and a flagon of wine. So all the people departed every one to his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba so asaa anjjanau soo simmido wode, Saa7oola na7iyaa Miikaala a mokkanau kiyada, "SHufuro asati kallo hemettiyoogaadan, hachchi Israa7eela kawoi ba ashkkaratu macca ashkkaratu sinttan kallottidi, aiba bonchchettidee!" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Then David returned to bless his household. And Michal the daughter of Saul came out to meet David, and said, How glorious was the king of Israel to day, who uncovered himself to day in the eyes of the handmaids of his servants, as one of the vain fellows shamelessly uncovereth himself!
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti, "Ne aawaappenne a so asaappe aattidi, ba asaa Israa7eela kaalettanaadan tana doorida GODAA sinttan duraas. Taani GODAA bonchchanau duriyoogaa aggikke.

English Sentences: And David said unto Michal, It was before the LORD, which chose me before thy father, and before all his house, to appoint me ruler over the people of the LORD, over Israel: therefore will I play before the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hagaappe aattada bironkka tana toochchana; taani ta huuphiyaa ziqqi oottana. SHin neeni giido macca ashkkaratu sinttan taani bonchchettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I will yet be more vile than thus, and will be base in mine own sight: and of the maidservants which thou hast spoken of, of them shall I be had in honour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Saa7oola na7iyaa Miikaala haiqqana gakkanaashin, na7a yelabeikku.

English Sentences: Therefore Michal the daughter of Saul had no child unto the day of her death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti ba kawo keettan uttidoogaappe guyyiyaaninne GODAI a a morkketu ubbaappe shemppissidoogaappe guyyiyan,

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the LORD had given him rest round about from all his enemies;
Wolaitta Sentences: hananabaa yootiya Naataana, "Taani zigaappe keexettida keettan de7ais; shin Xoossaa Taabootai dunkkaaniyan de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: That the king said unto Nathan the prophet, See now, I dwell in an house of cedar, but the ark of God dwelleth within curtains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Naataani Daawita, "Oottanau ne wozanai qoppidobaa ubbaa ootta; GODAI nenaara de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Nathan said to the king, Go, do all that is in thine heart; for the LORD is with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin he gallassa qammi GODAA qaalai Naataanakko yiidi,

English Sentences: And it came to pass that night, that the word of the LORD came unto Nathan, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ba; baada ta ashkkaraa Daawita hagaadan yaaga; GODAI hagaadan yaagees; "Taani de7ana keettaa keexxanai nena gidakka.

English Sentences: Go and tell my servant David, Thus saith the LORD, Shalt thou build me an house for me to dwell in?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani Israa7eelata Gibxxe biittaappe kessido gallassaappe doommada hachchi gakkanaashin keettan de7abeikke; taani dunkkaanen yaanne haanne yuuyaidda de7aas.

English Sentences: Whereas I have not dwelt in any house since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt, even to this day, but have walked in a tent and in a tabernacle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Israa7eela asaa ubbaara yuuyido soho ubban, ta asaa Israa7eela heemmana mala, taani sunttidoogeetuppe issuwaanne Taayyo zigaa keettaa aissi keexxabeikkii? gaada oichchabeikke" yaagees yaaga.

English Sentences: In all the places wherein I have walked with all the children of Israel spake I a word with any of the tribes of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people Israel, saying, Why build ye not me an house of cedar?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ha77ikka ta ashkkaraa Daawitassi oda; Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI nena hagaadan yaagees; "Taani nena hentta gadeppe, dorssaa heemmiyoosaappe denttada, ta asaa Israa7eela kaalettanaadan ekkaas.

English Sentences: Now therefore so shalt thou say unto my servant David, Thus saith the LORD of hosts, I took thee from the sheepcote, from following the sheep, to be ruler over my people, over Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni biido soho ubban taani nenaara gidaas; ne morkketa ubbaa taani ne sinttaappe diggaas. Ha77i simmi taani ha sa7an erettida gita asatu sunttaadan ne sunttaa gitayana.

English Sentences: And I was with thee whithersoever thou wentest, and have cut off all thine enemies out of thy sight, and have made thee a great name, like unto the name of the great men that are in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani ta asaassi Israa7eelassi soho immada, eta he sohuwan tokkana. Hegaa gishshau, eti bantta sohuwan de7ana; naa77antto eti shabbirettokkona.

English Sentences: Moreover I will appoint a place for my people Israel, and will plant them, that they may dwell in a place of their own, and move no more; neither shall the children of wickedness afflict them any more, as beforetime,
Wolaitta Sentences: Beni wodiyaaninne ta asaa Israa7eela bolli daannatiyaageeta taani sunttido wodiyaadan, iitati eta zaarettidi naaqqokkona. Qassi taani nena ne morkketu ubbaappe shemppissana. ""Hegaa bollankka GODAI ba huuphen ne zareti de7i be7anaadan oottanaagaa neessi yootees.

English Sentences: And as since the time that I commanded judges to be over my people Israel, and have caused thee to rest from all thine enemies. Also the LORD telleth thee that he will make thee an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne baree wurin haiqqada, ne maizza aawatun gaittiyo wode, ne gulbbataappe yelettida na7aa taani denttana; denttada a kawotettaa minttana.

English Sentences: And when thy days be fulfilled, and thou shalt sleep with thy fathers, I will set up thy seed after thee, which shall proceed out of thy bowels, and I will establish his kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta sunttaayyo keettaa keexxanai a; taani a kawotaa araataa merinau mintta essana.

English Sentences: He shall build an house for my name, and I will stablish the throne of his kingdom for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ayyo aawa gidana; ikka taayyo na7a gidana. I baliyo wode, taani a asaa xam77an, asai shociyo lissuwan a seerana.

English Sentences: I will be his father, and he shall be my son. If he commit iniquity, I will chasten him with the rod of men, and with the stripes of the children of men:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ne sinttaappe diggido Saa7oolappe ta siiqoi ekettidoogaadan, appe mulekka ekettenna.

English Sentences: But my mercy shall not depart away from him, as I took it from Saul, whom I put away before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne zaretinne ne kawotettai ta sinttan merinau gam77ana; ne kawotaa araataikka merinau minni eqqana" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And thine house and thy kingdom shall be established for ever before thee: thy throne shall be established for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naataani GODAI ayyo ajjuutan qonccissido qaalaa ubbaa Daawitayyo odiis.

English Sentences: According to all these words, and according to all this vision, so did Nathan speak unto David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Daawiti dunkkaaniyaa gelidi, GODAA sinttan uttiis. Uttidi hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni hagaa ubbaa taayyo oottanau taani oonee? Ta so asaikka aibee?

English Sentences: Then went king David in, and sat before the LORD, and he said, Who am I, O Lord GOD? and what is my house, that thou hast brought me hitherto?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, hagee ne aifiyaa sinttan guutta milatin, sinttappe ne ashkkaraa zaretussi hananabaakka haasayadasa. Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, hagee neeni asassi oossikka oottiyo ooso gidenna.

English Sentences: And this was yet a small thing in thy sight, O Lord GOD; but thou hast spoken also of thy servant's house for a great while to come. And is this the manner of man, O Lord GOD?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaappe aadhdhiyaabaa taani Daawiti neeyyo ai gaanau danddayiyaanaa? Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni tana ne ashkkaraa eraasa.

English Sentences: And what can David say more unto thee? for thou, Lord GOD, knowest thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne qaalaa gishshau, ne wozanaa qofaadan ha gitabaa oottada, tana ne ashkkaraa erissadasa.

English Sentences: For thy word's sake, and according to thine own heart, hast thou done all these great things, to make thy servant know them.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni ai keena giteeshsha! Ne mali issoinne baawa; nuuni nu haittan siyidoogaadankka, neeppe attin hara xoossi baawa.

English Sentences: Wherefore thou art great, O LORD God: for there is none like thee, neither is there any God beside thee, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asa oottanau wozido ne asaa Israa7eela milatiya hara kawotetti sa7aa bollan baawa. Neeni etayyo oottido gitanne maalaalissiya oosotu gaasuwan ne sunttai biittan sa7an erettiis. Neeni ne asaa sinttaappe hara kawotettatanne eta xoossata laaggadasa.

English Sentences: And what one nation in the earth is like thy people, even like Israel, whom God went to redeem for a people to himself, and to make him a name, and to do for you great things and terrible, for thy land, before thy people, which thou redeemedst to thee from Egypt, from the nations and their gods?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa Israa7eela merinau nebaa oottadasa. Abeet GODAU, neenikka eta Xoossaa gidadasa.

English Sentences: For thou hast confirmed to thyself thy people Israel to be a people unto thee for ever: and thou, LORD, art become their God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAU Xoossau, simmi ha77i neeni ne ashkkaraayyoonne a zerettaayyo oottana giidoogaa merinau naaga; neeni oottana giidoogaadankka ootta.

English Sentences: And now, O LORD God, the word that thou hast spoken concerning thy servant, and concerning his house, establish it for ever, and do as thou hast said.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan ne sunttai merinau gitatana; asaikka nena, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI Israa7eela Xoossaa yaagana. Ne ashkkaraa Daawita zaretikka ne sinttan minnidi eqqana.

English Sentences: And let thy name be magnified for ever, saying, The LORD of hosts is the God over Israel: and let the house of thy servant David be established before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU, Israa7eela Xoossau, neeni hagaa, Taani ne zareti de7i be7anaadan oottana yaagada taassi ne ashkkaraassi qonccadasa; hegaa gishshau, taani ne ashkkarai nena ha woosaa woossanau xalaas.

English Sentences: For thou, O LORD of hosts, God of Israel, hast revealed to thy servant, saying, I will build thee an house: therefore hath thy servant found in his heart to pray this prayer unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni Xoossaattennee! Ne qaalaikka ammanettiyaagaa; neeni ha lo77o qaalaa taayyo ne ashkkaraayyo oottana gaadasa.

English Sentences: And now, O Lord GOD, thou art that God, and thy words be true, and thou hast promised this goodness unto thy servant:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sinttan yaa merinau gam77anaadan, ne ashkkaraa zariyaa anjjanau ufaitta. Aissi giikko, Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, hegaa haasayadasa; qassi ne anjjuwan ne ashkkaraa zareti merinaukka anjjettana" yaagidi woossiis.

English Sentences: Therefore now let it please thee to bless the house of thy servant, that it may continue for ever before thee: for thou, O Lord GOD, hast spoken it: and with thy blessing let the house of thy servant be blessed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Kawoi Daawiti Pilisxxeemata xoonidi haariis; yaatidi Metegi7aama giyo katamaa Pilisxxeema asatu kushiyaappe wotti ekkiis.

English Sentences: And after this it came to pass that David smote the Philistines, and subdued them: and David took Methegammah out of the hand of the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Moo7aaba asatakka Daawiti xooniis. Biittan i eta zin77issidi wodoruwan likkiis; naa77u wodoro likettida ubbata woriis; heezzantto wodoro likettidaageeta paxa aggiis. Yaatin Moo7aaba asati Daawitayyo haarettidi giiraa giiridosona.

English Sentences: And he smote Moab, and measured them with a line, casting them down to the ground; even with two lines measured he to put to death, and with one full line to keep alive. And so the Moabites became David's servants, and brought gifts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Rahooba na7ai, Xooba Kawoi Hadaadi7eezeri Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa matan de7iya ba zawaa zaari ekkanau biidi, Daawitaara olettin, Daawiti a xooniis.

English Sentences: David smote also Hadadezer, the son of Rehob, king of Zobah, as he went to recover his border at the river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti a asaappe issi sha7anne laappun xeetu paraasatanne laatamu sha7u tohuwaasata omooddiis. Daawiti gaareta goochchanau xeetu parata ashshidi, hara paratu ubbau gaadiyaa gilddayiis.

English Sentences: And David took from him a thousand chariots, and seven hundred horsemen, and twenty thousand footmen: and David houghed all the chariot horses, but reserved of them for an hundred chariots.
Wolaitta Sentences: Damasqqo kataman de7iya Sooriyaa olanchchati Xooba Kawuwaa Hadaadi7eezera maaddanau yiido wode, Daawiti etappe laatamanne naa77u sha7ata woriis.

English Sentences: And when the Syrians of Damascus came to succour Hadadezer king of Zobah, David slew of the Syrians two and twenty thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Daawiti Sooriyaa kawotettaaninne Damasqqo kataman olanchchatu qatota medhdhiis. Yaatin Sooriyaa asati Daawitayyo haarettidi, giiraa giiridosona. Daawiti biido soho ubban GODAI ayyo xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: Then David put garrisons in Syria of Damascus: and the Syrians became servants to David, and brought gifts. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi7eezera ola gadaawati oiqqiyo worqqa gonddalliyaa Daawiti ekkidi, Yerusalaame ehiis.

English Sentences: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bexaahanne Berotaaya giyo Hadaadi7eezera katamatuppe Kawoi Daawiti nahaasiyaa giyo birataa keehi daruwaa ekkiis.

English Sentences: And from Betah, and from Berothai, cities of Hadadezer, king David took exceeding much brass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hadaadi7eezera olanchchata ubbaa Daawiti xoonidoogaa Hamaata Kawoi Too7i siyiis.

English Sentences: When Toi king of Hamath heard that David had smitten all the host of Hadadezer,
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyidi Hadaadi7eezera olidi xoonido gishshau, a hashshu gaanaunne sarotanau ba na7aa Yoraama Kawuwaa Daawitakko kiittiis. Aissi giikko, Hadaadi7eezeri Too7aara olettiiddi gam77iis. Yoraami yiiddi worqqaappe, biraappenne nahaasiyaappe merettida miishshata Daawitayyo ehiis.

English Sentences: Then Toi sent Joram his son unto king David, to salute him, and to bless him, because he had fought against Hadadezer, and smitten him: for Hadadezer had wars with Toi. And Joram brought with him vessels of silver, and vessels of gold, and vessels of brass:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehin Kawoi Daawiti ha miishshata GODAAYYO dummayi wottiis. Qassi Daawiti ba xoonido kawotettatuppe ubbaappe,

English Sentences: Which also king David did dedicate unto the LORD, with the silver and gold that he had dedicated of all nations which he subdued;
Wolaitta Sentences: Sooriyaappe, Moo7aabappe, Amoona asatuppe, Pilisxxeema asatuppenne Amaaleeqa asatuppe ekkido worqqaanne biraa Rahooba na7aa, Xooba Kawuwaa Hadaadi7eezerappe ekkido omooduwaa kase peeshan GODAAYYO dummayi wottiis.

English Sentences: Of Syria, and of Moab, and of the children of Ammon, and of the Philistines, and of Amalek, and of the spoil of Hadadezer, son of Rehob, king of Zobah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maxine Wombban tammanne hosppun sha7u Eedooma asata Daawiti wori simmidoogaappe guyyiyan, i haittatiis.

English Sentences: And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Eedooma biitta ubban olanchchatu qatota medhdhiis; yaatin he biittaa asai ubbai Daawitayyo haarettiis. Daawiti biido soho ubban GODAI ayyo xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: And he put garrisons in Edom; throughout all Edom put he garrisons, and all they of Edom became David's servants. And the LORD preserved David whithersoever he went.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan oottidi, Daawiti Israa7eela ubbaa bolli kawotiis; kawotidi ba asaa ubbaa xillotettaaninne suure pirddan aissiis.

English Sentences: And David reigned over all Israel; and David executed judgment and justice unto all his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7ai Yoo7aabi olanchchatu gadaawaa; Ahiluuda na7ai Yoosaafixi hanidabaa xaafiyaagaa.

English Sentences: And Joab the son of Zeruiah was over the host; and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahixuuba na7ai Xaadooqinne Abiyaataara na7ai Abimeleki qeeseta; Saraayi qassi waanna xaafiyaa;

English Sentences: And Zadok the son of Ahitub, and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar, were the priests; and Seraiah was the scribe;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi Daawita naagiya olanchchatu halaqaa; Daawita attuma naati kawuwaa zoriyaageeta.

English Sentences: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over both the Cherethites and the Pelethites; and David's sons were chief rulers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi Daawiti, "Yonaataana gishshau, taani ayyo kehanaadan hanno gakkanau Saa7oola qanttaappe attida asi de7iishsha?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And David said, Is there yet any that is left of the house of Saul, that I may shew him kindness for Jonathan's sake?
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Xiiba giyo issi ashkkarai Saa7oola son de7ees; i Daawita sintti yaanaadan xeesidosona; yin kawoi a, "Neeni Xiibee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin, "Ee taani Xiiba, ne ashkkaraa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there was of the house of Saul a servant whose name was Ziba. And when they had called him unto David, the king said unto him, Art thou Ziba? And he said, Thy servant is he.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi a, "Xoossaa kehatettaa taani kehanaadan, Saa7oola qanttaappe palahida issi asinne baawee?" yaagiis. Yaagin Xiibi kawuwaa, "Yonaataana naatuppe issoi hanno gakkanaashin de7ees; he na7aayyo naa77u tohotikka sila" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said, Is there not yet any of the house of Saul, that I may shew the kindness of God unto him? And Ziba said unto the king, Jonathan hath yet a son, which is lame on his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi, "I awan de7ii?" yaagiis. Yaagin Xiibi, "Lodabaara giyoosan Ammi7eela na7aa Maakira son de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto him, Where is he? And Ziba said unto the king, Behold, he is in the house of Machir, the son of Ammiel, in Lodebar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Kawoi Daawiti kiittidi, Lodabaarappe Ammi7eela na7aa Maakira sooppe ehiissiis.

English Sentences: Then king David sent, and fetched him out of the house of Machir, the son of Ammiel, from Lodebar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7aa Yonaataana na7ai Mafibosheeti Daawitakko yiis; yi gakkidi, Daawita sinttan lichchi giidi zin77iis. Yaatin, Daawiti a, "Mafibosheetaa!" yaagidi xeesiis. Xeesin i, "Abe ta godau, taani ne ashkkaraa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan, the son of Saul, was come unto David, he fell on his face, and did reverence. And David said, Mephibosheth. And he answered, Behold thy servant!
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti a, "Yayyoppa; ne aawaa Yonaataana gishshau, taani neeyyo kehana. Ne aawaa aawaa Saa7oola gadiyaa ubbaa taani neeyyo zaarana; qassi neeni ubba wode ta masoofiyaappe maana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto him, Fear not: for I will surely shew thee kindness for Jonathan thy father's sake, and will restore thee all the land of Saul thy father; and thou shalt eat bread at my table continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Mafibosheeti naa77anttuwaakka lichchi gi zin77idi, "Haiqqida kana malaa tana neeni wudada xeellanau, ne ashkkarai taani oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he bowed himself, and said, What is thy servant, that thou shouldest look upon such a dead dog as I am?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Saa7oola ashkkaraa Xiiba xeesidi, "Saa7oolabaanne Saa7oola so asaabaa gididabaa ubbaa taani ne godaa na7aa na7aayyo immaas.

English Sentences: Then the king called to Ziba, Saul's servant, and said unto him, I have given unto thy master's son all that pertained to Saul and to all his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne godaa na7aa na7ai maanaadan neeni, ne naatinne ne ashkkarati ayyo gadiyaa goyite; goyidi mokkida kattaa ayyo ehiite. Gidikkokka, ne godaa na7aa na7ai Mafibosheeti ubba wode ta masoofiyaappe maana" yaagiis. Xiibayyo tammanne ichchashu attuma naatinne laatamu ashkkarati de7oosona.

English Sentences: Thou therefore, and thy sons, and thy servants, shall till the land for him, and thou shalt bring in the fruits, that thy master's son may have food to eat: but Mephibosheth thy master's son shall eat bread alway at my table. Now Ziba had fifteen sons and twenty servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiibi kawuwaa, "Neeni ta godai kawoi ne ashkkaraa azazido ubbabaa taani ne ashkkarai polana" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, Mafibosheeti kawuwaa naatuppe issuwaadan kawuwaa masoofiyaappe miis.

English Sentences: Then said Ziba unto the king, According to all that my lord the king hath commanded his servant, so shall thy servant do. As for Mephibosheth, said the king, he shall eat at my table, as one of the king's sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mafibosheetayyo Miika giyo guutta na7ai de7ees. Xiiba son de7iya asati ubbati Mafibosheetayyo ashkkara gididosona.

English Sentences: And Mephibosheth had a young son, whose name was Micha. And all that dwelt in the house of Ziba were servants unto Mephibosheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mafibosheeti ubba wode kawuwaa masoofiyaappe miyo gishshau, i Yerusalaamen de7ees. A gedee naa77aikka sila.

English Sentences: So Mephibosheth dwelt in Jerusalem: for he did eat continually at the king's table; and was lame on both his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Amoonatu Kawoi Naa7oosi haiqqiis; haiqqin a na7ai Hanuuni a sohuwan kawotiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after this, that the king of the children of Ammon died, and Hanun his son reigned in his stead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti, "A aawai taayyo kehidoogaadan Naa7oosa na7aa Hanuunayyo taanikka kehana" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, a minttettanau Daawiti ba asaa akko kiittiis. Daawita asai Amoona biitti gakkido wode,

English Sentences: Then said David, I will shew kindness unto Hanun the son of Nahash, as his father shewed kindness unto me. And David sent to comfort him by the hand of his servants for his father. And David's servants came into the land of the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoona asaa halaqati bantta godaa Hanuuna, "Daawiti nena minttettanau ha asata kiittidoogee ne aawaa bonchchuwaa gishshaassa gaadiiyye? I ba asaa kiittidoogee ha katamaa xeellanaassa, wochchanaassanne olidi xoonanaassa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the princes of the children of Ammon said unto Hanun their lord, Thinkest thou that David doth honour thy father, that he hath sent comforters unto thee? hath not David rather sent his servants unto thee, to search the city, and to spy it out, and to overthrow it?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hanuuni Daawiti kiittidoogeeta oiqqidi, eta buuchchaappe baggaa meediis; eta maayuwaakka uttiyo dulliyaa baggaappe qanxxi ekkidi, eta yeddiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore Hanun took David's servants, and shaved off the one half of their beards, and cut off their garments in the middle, even to their buttocks, and sent them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asati daro yeellatidosona. Daawiti hegaa siyidi, i etaara gaittiya asa kiittiis; etakko kiittidi, "Intte buuchchai diccana gakkanaashin, Yarkko Kataman de7ishshite; hegaappe guyyiyan haa yiite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they told it unto David, he sent to meet them, because the men were greatly ashamed: and the king said, Tarry at Jericho until your beards be grown, and then return.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonati bantta oosuwan Daawiti eta morkkanaadan oottidoogaa erido wode, Beeti-Rahoobanne Xooba katamatun de7iya Sooriyaa asatuppe laatamu sha7u tohuwaasata, Xoba biittaappe tammanne naa77u sha7u asatanne Maa7ika biittaa kawuwaappe issi sha7u asata qaxaridosona.

English Sentences: And when the children of Ammon saw that they stank before David, the children of Ammon sent and hired the Syrians of Bethrehob, and the Syrians of Zoba, twenty thousand footmen, and of king Maacah a thousand men, and of Ishtob twelve thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti hegaa siyido wode, Yoo7aabanne de7iya olanchchata ubbaa eta bolli yeddiis.

English Sentences: And when David heard of it, he sent Joab, and all the host of the mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonati kiyidi, katamaa penggiyan olau salppidosona; Xoobappenne Rahoobappe yiida Sooriyaa asati, Xooba asatinne Maa7ika asati dembban banttarkka de7oosona.

English Sentences: And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array at the entering in of the gate: and the Syrians of Zoba, and of Rehob, and Ishtob, and Maacah, were by themselves in the field.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi bana olai sinttaaranne guyyeera doggomidoogaa be7iis; be7idi Israa7eelatu giddoppe ubbaappe minniya olanchchata doori ekkidi, Sooriyaa asatu sinttan salppissiis.

English Sentences: When Joab saw that the front of the battle was against him before and behind, he chose of all the choice men of Israel, and put them in array against the Syrians:
Wolaitta Sentences: Attida asata ba ishai Abishaayi azazana mala oottidi, Amoona asatu sinttan salppissiis.

English Sentences: And the rest of the people he delivered into the hand of Abishai his brother, that he might put them in array against the children of Ammon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi ba ishaa, "Sooriyaa asati taayyo wolqqaamikko, neeni yaada, tana maadda. Qassi Amoona asati neeyyo wolqqaamikko, taani yaada, nena maaddana.

English Sentences: And he said, If the Syrians be too strong for me, then thou shalt help me: but if the children of Ammon be too strong for thee, then I will come and help thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi minna! Nu asaa gishshaunne nu Xoossaa katamatu gishshau, ane minni olettoos. GODAI bana lo77iyaabaa ootto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Be of good courage, and let us play the men for our people, and for the cities of our God: and the LORD do that which seemeth him good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabinne aara de7iya asai Sooriyaa asatuura olettanau lauhu giidosona. Yaatin, Sooriyaa asati a sinttappe baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And Joab drew nigh, and the people that were with him, unto the battle against the Syrians: and they fled before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sooriyaa asati baqatidoogaa Amoona asati be7ido wode, etikka Abishaaya sinttappe baqatidi, katamaa gelidosona. Gelin Yoo7aabi Amoona asatuura olettiyoogaa aggidi, Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: And when the children of Ammon saw that the Syrians were fled, then fled they also before Abishai, and entered into the city. So Joab returned from the children of Ammon, and came to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sooriyaa asati Israa7eela asati eta xoonidoogaa erido wode, bantta olanchchata ubbaa zaaridi shiishshidosona.

English Sentences: And when the Syrians saw that they were smitten before Israel, they gathered themselves together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Hadaadi7eezeri Sooriyaa asata Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe hefintta baggappe kiittidi ehiissiis; ehiissin Helaama biidosona. Hadaadi7eezera olanchchatu gadaawai SHobaaki eta kaalettees.

English Sentences: And Hadarezer sent, and brought out the Syrians that were beyond the river: and they came to Helam; and Shobach the captain of the host of Hadarezer went before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti hegaa siyido wode, Israa7eela olanchchata shiishshidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniis; pinnidi Helaama gakkiis. Sooriyaa asati Daawitaara gaittanau salppidi, aara olettidosona.
