Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba asata ubbaa issippe shiishshiis; shiishshidi shaalaqatanne mato halaqata eta bolli sunttiis.

English Sentences: And David numbered the people that were with him, and set captains of thousands and captains of hundreds over them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti asaa heezzu citan shaakkiis; issi citaa Yoo7aabi azaziis; naa77antto citaa Yoo7aaba ishai, Xaruuyi na7ai Abishaayi azaziis; heezzantto citaa qassi Gaatiyaa Ittaayi azaziis. Kawoi asaa, "Taani ta huuphenkka inttenaara issippe baana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David sent forth a third part of the people under the hand of Joab, and a third part under the hand of Abishai the son of Zeruiah, Joab's brother, and a third part under the hand of Ittai the Gittite. And the king said unto the people, I will surely go forth with you myself also.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asai a, "Neeni baanau bessenna! Nuuni baqatiyaakkonne, eti nubaa koyokkona; harai atto nuuni baggai haiqqiyaakkokka, nubaa eti wudokkona. SHin neeni nuuppe tammu sha7atuppe daraasa; hegaa gishshau, neeni kataman uttada, nuuyyo maaduwaa kiittikko lo77o" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the people answered, Thou shalt not go forth: for if we flee away, they will not care for us; neither if half of us die, will they care for us: but now thou art worth ten thousand of us: therefore now it is better that thou succour us out of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi eta, "Inttena lo77idabaa taani oottana" yaagiis. Daawiti dirssaa penggen eqqidaashin, asai ubbai xeetai xeetai, sha7ai sha7ai ba citan citan salppidi kiyiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto them, What seemeth you best I will do. And the king stood by the gate side, and all the people came out by hundreds and by thousands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, kawoi Yoo7aaba Abishaayanne Ittaaya, "Ta gishshau giidi, he yelaga bitaniyaa Abeselooma qohoppite" yaagidi azaziis. Kawoi Abeseloomabaa gadaawatu ubbaayyo odiyo wode, olanchchati ubbai siyidosona.

English Sentences: And the king commanded Joab and Abishai and Ittai, saying, Deal gently for my sake with the young man, even with Absalom. And all the people heard when the king gave all the captains charge concerning Absalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita olanchchati Israa7eelatuura olettanau gaxariyan salppidosona; olaa sohoi Efireema woraana.

English Sentences: So the people went out into the field against Israel: and the battle was in the wood of Ephraim;
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan Daawita olanchchati Israa7eela olanchchata xoonidosona; he gallassi keehi daro asai, laatamu sha7u asai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: Where the people of Israel were slain before the servants of David, and there was there a great slaughter that day of twenty thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olai gaxariyaa ubbaa gakkiis; he gallassi worai wurssido asai bisoi wurssido asaappe daro.

English Sentences: For the battle was there scattered over the face of all the country: and the wood devoured more people that day than the sword devoured.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeseloomi akeekennan de7iiddi Daawita asatuura gaittiis; Abeseloomi ba baquluwaa toggidaashin, daro daashshai de7iyo wolaa garssi baquloi geliis; gelin Abeselooma huuphee wolaa ballan oiqettiis. Abeseloomi sa7aappenne saluwaappe gidduwan giili giishin, i toggido baquloi sinttau bi aggiis.

English Sentences: And Absalom met the servants of David. And Absalom rode upon a mule, and the mule went under the thick boughs of a great oak, and his head caught hold of the oak, and he was taken up between the heaven and the earth; and the mule that was under him went away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaappe issoi hegaa be7idi Yoo7aaba, "Be7a! Abeseloomi issi wolaa bolli kaqettidaagaa taani be7aas" yaagidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And a certain man saw it, and told Joab, and said, Behold, I saw Absalom hanged in an oak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yootin Yoo7aabi baayyo yootida bitaniyaa, "Hee? Be7aas gai? Aibissi biittau duge shocabeikkii? Neeni shocidabaa gidiyaakko, taani neeyyo tammu xaqara biraanne issi qabattuwaa immanaagaa shin" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joab said unto the man that told him, And, behold, thou sawest him, and why didst thou not smite him there to the ground? and I would have given thee ten shekels of silver, and a girdle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin bitanee, "Neeni sha7u xaqara biraa ta kushiyan wottiyaakkokka, taani kawuwaa na7aa bolli ta kushiyaa denttikke! Nuuni ubbai siyishin, kawoi nenanne Abishaaya Ittaaya, Ta gishshau giidi, yelaga bitaniyaa Abeselooma ashshite yaagidi azaziis.

English Sentences: And the man said unto Joab, Though I should receive a thousand shekels of silver in mine hand, yet would I not put forth mine hand against the king's son: for in our hearing the king charged thee and Abishai and Ittai, saying, Beware that none touch the young man Absalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kawuwaa azazuwaa shaarada Abeselooma woridabaa gidiyaakko, kawoi ubbabaa siyiyoogaadan hegaakka siyanaagee attenna. Neeni he wode taappe haahuwan eqqana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Otherwise I should have wrought falsehood against mine own life: for there is no matter hid from the king, and thou thyself wouldest have set thyself against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yoo7aabi a, "Taani nenaara hagaadan gam77ikke" yaagiis; yaagidi heezzu tooraa ba kushiyan ekkidi, Abeseloomi wolan kaqettidi paxa de7iyaagaa wozana aifiyan caddiis.

English Sentences: Then said Joab, I may not tarry thus with thee. And he took three darts in his hand, and thrust them through the heart of Absalom, while he was yet alive in the midst of the oak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Caddin Yoo7aaba ola miishshaa tookkiya tammati Abeselooma dooddidi, shoci woridosona.

English Sentences: And ten young men that bare Joab's armour compassed about and smote Absalom, and slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabi olaa essanau malkkataa punniis; punnin asai Israa7eelata yedettiyoogaa aggiis.

English Sentences: And Joab blew the trumpet, and the people returned from pursuing after Israel: for Joab held back the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Abeselooma ekki efiidi, woran de7iya gita ollaa giddon yeggidi, daro shuchchaa a bolli dooridosona. He wode Israa7eela asai ubbai ba so ba so baqatiis.

English Sentences: And they took Absalom, and cast him into a great pit in the wood, and laid a very great heap of stones upon him: and all Israel fled every one to his tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeseloomi paxa de7iiddi, "Ta sunttaa hassayissiya na7i taayyo baawa" yaagidi, bana hassayissiya shuchchaa massido tuussaa kawo dilbban essiis; essidi he tuussaa ba sunttan xeesiis. Hachchi gakkanaashin, he tuussai "Abeselooma tuussaa" geetettees.

English Sentences: Now Absalom in his lifetime had taken and reared up for himself a pillar, which is in the king's dale: for he said, I have no son to keep my name in remembrance: and he called the pillar after his own name: and it is called unto this day, Absalom's place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xaadooqa na7aa Ahima7aaxi Yoo7aaba, "A morkketu kushiyaappe GODAI a ashshido mishiraachchuwaa sissanau, taani kawuwaakko woxxa baada yootais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Ahimaaz the son of Zadok, Let me now run, and bear the king tidings, how that the LORD hath avenged him of his enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yoo7aabi Ahima7aaxa, "CHii! Hachchi neeni mishiraachcho yootiyo gallassa gidenna; hara gallassi yootanau danddayaasa. Kawuwaa na7ai hachchi haiqqido gishshau, neeni hachchi yootanau koshshenna" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joab said unto him, Thou shalt not bear tidings this day, but thou shalt bear tidings another day: but this day thou shalt bear no tidings, because the king's son is dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi Yoo7aabi Toophphe asa gidiya issi bitaniyaa xeegidi, "Ba; baada neeni be7idobaa kawuwaayyo yoota" yaagiis; yaagin he bitanee Yoo7aabayyo ziggidi woxxiis.

English Sentences: Then said Joab to Cushi, Go tell the king what thou hast seen. And Cushi bowed himself unto Joab, and ran.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaadooqa na7ai Ahima7aaxi naa77anttuwaakka Yoo7aaba, "Ainne hano; taani ha Toophphe bitaniyaa geeduwaa woxxais" yaagiis. Yaagin Yoo7aabi, "Ta na7au, neeyyo woito ehiya odoi bainnaashin, neeni aibissi woxxanau koyai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said Ahimaaz the son of Zadok yet again to Joab, But howsoever, let me, I pray thee, also run after Cushi. And Joab said, Wherefore wilt thou run, my son, seeing that thou hast no tidings ready?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ahima7aaxi Yoo7aaba, "Ainne hano; taani woxxanau koyais" yaagiis. Yaagin Yoo7aabi a, "Yaanikko woxxa" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, Ahima7aaxi dembbaa ogiyaa oiqqidi woxxiis; woxxidi Toophphe bitaniyaa yeggidi aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: But howsoever, said he, let me run. And he said unto him, Run. Then Ahimaaz ran by the way of the plain, and overran Cushi.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbiyaa penggiyaayyo kare dooyettiya sanqqaappenne soo dooyettiya sanqqaappe gidduwan aaho sohuwan Daawiti uttidaashin, naagiya bitanee gimbbiyaara ohettida penggiyaa sarggaa huuphiyaa pude kiyiis; kiyidi xeellidi, issi bitanee barkka woxxiyaagaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And David sat between the two gates: and the watchman went up to the roof over the gate unto the wall, and lifted up his eyes, and looked, and behold a man running alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naagiya bitanee kawuwaa xeesidi yootiis. Yootin kawoi, "I barkka de7ikko, mishiraachchuwaa ekki yees" yaagiis. Woxxiya bitanee etakko mati matidi yiis.

English Sentences: And the watchman cried, and told the king. And the king said, If he be alone, there is tidings in his mouth. And he came apace, and drew near.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naagiyaagee hara asikka woxxiyaagaa be7iis; be7idi penggiyaa naagiya bitaniyaa, "Be7a! Hara bitaneekka barkka woxxees" yaagiis. Kawoi, "Ha bitaneekka qassi mishiraachchuwaa ekki yees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the watchman saw another man running: and the watchman called unto the porter, and said, Behold another man running alone. And the king said, He also bringeth tidings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naagiyaagee, "Koiro bitaniyaa wottai Xaadooqa na7aa Ahima7aaxa wottaa tau milatees" yaagiis. Yaagin kawoi, "I lo77o asa; i lo77o odoora yees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the watchman said, Me thinketh the running of the foremost is like the running of Ahimaaz the son of Zadok. And the king said, He is a good man, and cometh with good tidings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahima7aaxi kawuwaa xeesidi, "Ubbabaikka lo77o!" yaagiis. Kawuwaa sinttan lichchi giidi gufannidi, "Ta godaa kawuwaa bolli bantta kushiyaa denttida asata neeyyo aattidi immida GODAI ne Xoossai galatetto" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ahimaaz called, and said unto the king, All is well. And he fell down to the earth upon his face before the king, and said, Blessed be the LORD thy God, which hath delivered up the men that lifted up their hand against my lord the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi, "Yelaga bitanee Abeseloomi saroo?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Ahima7aaxi, "Yoo7aabi tana kiittana haniyo wode, wolqqaama gurubai de7iyaagaa be7aas; shin i aibakkonne taani erabeikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said, Is the young man Absalom safe? And Ahimaaz answered, When Joab sent the king's servant, and me thy servant, I saw a great tumult, but I knew not what it was.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi a, "Yaa shiiqa eqqa" yaagiis; yaagin i yaakko shiiqidi eqqiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto him, Turn aside, and stand here. And he turned aside, and stood still.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Toophphe bitanee gakkidi kawuwaayyo, "Ta godau kawuwau, mishiraachcho! Ne bolli denddidaageetu ubbaa kushiyaappe GODAI hachchi nena ashshiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, Cushi came; and Cushi said, Tidings, my lord the king: for the LORD hath avenged thee this day of all them that rose up against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Toophphe bitaniyaa, "Yelaga bitanee Abeseloomi saroo?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin Toophphe bitanee kawuwaa, "Ta godau kawuwau, ne morkketinne ne bolli iitabaa oottanau denddiyaageeti ubbati he yelaga bitaniyaadan hanona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto Cushi, Is the young man Absalom safe? And Cushi answered, The enemies of my lord the king, and all that rise against thee to do thee hurt, be as that young man is.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi daroppe azzaniis; gimbbiyaa penggiyaa huuphen de7iya keettaa gelidi yeekkiis; kawoi biiddi, "Aayye ta na7au Abeseloomaa! Ta na7au! Ta na7au Abeseloomaa! Ne gishshaa taani haiqqarkkinaashsha! Aayye ta na7au Abeseloomaa! Ta na7au!" yaagidi yeekkiis.

English Sentences: And the king was much moved, and went up to the chamber over the gate, and wept: and as he went, thus he said, O my son Absalom, my son, my son Absalom! would God I had died for thee, O Absalom, my son, my son!
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeseloomayyo kawoi yeekkeesinne zilaalees" yaagidi Yoo7aabayyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: And it was told Joab, Behold, the king weepeth and mourneth for Absalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olanchchati ubbai, "Kawoi ba na7aayyo yeekkees" giyoogaa siyido gishshau, he gallassi eti ubbai xoonido xoonoi yeehuwau laamettiis.

English Sentences: And the victory that day was turned into mourning unto all the people: for the people heard say that day how the king was grieved for his son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olaappe baqatidi yeellatida olanchchatudan, asai he gallassi wuuqettidi katamaa geliis.

English Sentences: And the people gat them by stealth that day into the city, as people being ashamed steal away when they flee in battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi ba som77uwaa gullettidi, ba qaalaa xoqqissidi, "Aayye ta na7au Abeseloomaa! Aayye Abeseloomaa ta na7au! Ta na7au!" yaagidi zilaaliis.

English Sentences: But the king covered his face, and the king cried with a loud voice, O my son Absalom, O Absalom, my son, my son!
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabi he keettaa biidi kawuwaa, "Ne shemppuwaa, ne attuma naatunne ne macca naatu shemppuwaa, ne maccaasatunne ne baakkotu shemppuwaa hachchi ashshida ne asaa ubbaa neeni hachchi kaushshadasa.

English Sentences: And Joab came into the house to the king, and said, Thou hast shamed this day the faces of all thy servants, which this day have saved thy life, and the lives of thy sons and of thy daughters, and the lives of thy wives, and the lives of thy concubines;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena ixxiyaageeta neeni siiqaasa; nena siiqiyaageeta neeni ixxaasa. Ne olanchchatinne eta halaqati neeyyo aibanne gidennaagaa neeni hachchi qonccissadasa. Nuuni ubbai haiqqin, Abeseloomi hachchi paxa attidaakko, neeni ufaittanaagaa taani be7aas.

English Sentences: In that thou lovest thine enemies, and hatest thy friends. For thou hast declared this day, that thou regardest neither princes nor servants: for this day I perceive, that if Absalom had lived, and all we had died this day, then it had pleased thee well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i dendda! Kare kiyada ne asaa minttetta. GODAI ero! Neeni kiyana xayikko, hachchi qammi nenaara issi asinne attenna. Ne yelagatettaasappe hachchi gakkanaashin, nena gakkida iitaa ubbaappe hagee neeyyo aadhdhiya iita gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now therefore arise, go forth, and speak comfortably unto thy servants: for I swear by the LORD, if thou go not forth, there will not tarry one with thee this night: and that will be worse unto thee than all the evil that befell thee from thy youth until now.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi denddidi gimbbiyaa penggen uttiis. "Kawoi penggen uttiis" giyoogaa asati ubbai siyido wode, kawuwaa sintti yiidosona. He wode Israa7eela asati ubbai bantta so bantta so baqatidosona.

English Sentences: Then the king arose, and sat in the gate. And they told unto all the people, saying, Behold, the king doth sit in the gate. And all the people came before the king: for Israel had fled every man to his tent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela zareti ubbai issoi issuwaara hagaadan yaagidi palamettoosona; "Kawoi Daawiti nuna nu morkketu kushiyaappe ashshiis; nuna Pilisxxeema asatu kushiyaappe wotti ekkiis; shin i ha77i Abeselooma gaasuwan biittaa aggidi baqatiis.

English Sentences: And all the people were at strife throughout all the tribes of Israel, saying, The king saved us out of the hand of our enemies, and he delivered us out of the hand of the Philistines; and now he is fled out of the land for Absalom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu bolli kawotanaadan nuuni tiyido Abeseloomi olan haiqqiichchiis. Yaatin, kawuwaa guyye ehaanau intte aibissi co77u giidetii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And Absalom, whom we anointed over us, is dead in battle. Now therefore why speak ye not a word of bringing the king back?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Daawiti qeesetuyyo Xaadooqayyoonne Abiyaataarayyo kiitaa yeddidi, "Yihudaa cimata hagaadan yaagite; Daawiti hagaadan yaagees; "Israa7eela asai ubbai haasayiyoogee kawuwaa gakkiis. Yaatin, kawuwaa a keettaa zaari ehaanau intte aibissi haratuppe guyye atteetii?

English Sentences: And king David sent to Zadok and to Abiathar the priests, saying, Speak unto the elders of Judah, saying, Why are ye the last to bring the king back to his house? seeing the speech of all Israel is come to the king, even to his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte ta ishantta; intte ta ashonne ta suutta. Yaatin, kawuwaa guyye zaari ehaanau intte aibissi haratuppe guyye atteetii?" yaagees yaagite.

English Sentences: Ye are my brethren, ye are my bones and my flesh: wherefore then are ye the last to bring back the king?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Amaasayyookka, Daawiti nena, "Neeni ta ashonne ta suutta gidikkii? Hachchippe doommin, taani nena Yoo7aaba sohuwan ta olanchchatuyyo gadaawa kessana xayikko, Xoossai tana woro!" yaagees yaagite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And say ye to Amasa, Art thou not of my bone, and of my flesh? God do so to me, and more also, if thou be not captain of the host before me continually in the room of Joab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa haasayai Yihudaa asatu ubbaa wozanaa issuwaa oottidi maizziis. Hegaa gishshau, eti kawuwaakko kiittidi, "Neenikka ne asai ubbaikka haa simmite" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he bowed the heart of all the men of Judah, even as the heart of one man; so that they sent this word unto the king, Return thou, and all thy servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi simmidi, Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa gakkanaassi yiis. Yihudaa asati kawuwaa mokkanaunne Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinttanau, Gelggala giyoosaa yiidosona.

English Sentences: So the king returned, and came to Jordan. And Judah came to Gilgal, to go to meet the king, to conduct the king over Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baahuriima katamaappe yiida Biniyaama zaree, Geera na7ai SHim77i Daawita mokkanau ellellidi, Yihudaa asatuura biis.

English Sentences: And Shimei the son of Gera, a Benjamite, which was of Bahurim, hasted and came down with the men of Judah to meet king David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biishin aara Biniyaama zare gidida sha7u asati, Saa7oola so ashkkarai Xiibi, a naati tammanne ichchashatinne a ashkkarati laatamati de7oosona. Eti kawoi de7iyoosaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa jaamiiddi biidosona.

English Sentences: And there were a thousand men of Benjamin with him, and Ziba the servant of the house of Saul, and his fifteen sons and his twenty servants with him; and they went over Jordan before the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa so asaa pinttanaunne kawuwaa ufaissiyoobaa oottanau pinuwaara pinnidi biidosona. Geera na7ai SHim77i Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnido wode, kawuwaa sinttan gufannidi,

English Sentences: And there went over a ferry boat to carry over the king's household, and to do what he thought good. And Shimei the son of Gera fell down before the king, as he was come over Jordan;
Wolaitta Sentences: hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta mooruwaa kawoi atto go. Ta godai kawoi Yerusalaameppe kiyiyo gallassi taani ne ashkkarai balido balaa neeni hassayoppa. Hegaa ne uluwan oiqqoppa.

English Sentences: And said unto the king, Let not my lord impute iniquity unto me, neither do thou remember that which thy servant did perversely the day that my lord the king went out of Jerusalem, that the king should take it to his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ne ashkkarai taani nagaraa oottidoogaa erais; shin nena ta godaa kawuwaa mokkanau, Yooseefa so asa ubbaappe koirottada taani hachchi yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For thy servant doth know that I have sinned: therefore, behold, I am come the first this day of all the house of Joseph to go down to meet my lord the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xaruuyi na7ai Abishaayi, "SHim77i GODAI tiyido kawuwaa qanggido gishshau, i haiqqanau bessenneeyye?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Abishai the son of Zeruiah answered and said, Shall not Shimei be put to death for this, because he cursed the LORD's anointed?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti Abishaaya, "Inttenoo, Xaruuyi naatoo, inttena gattiyaabi aibee? Intte hachchi taayyo morkke gideetii! Hachchi Israa7eelan ai asinne haiqqenna! Hachchi Israa7eela kawoi tanattennee!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said, What have I to do with you, ye sons of Zeruiah, that ye should this day be adversaries unto me? shall there any man be put to death this day in Israel? for do not I know that I am this day king over Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi SHim77a, "Neeni haiqqakka" yaagidi ayyo caaqqiis.

English Sentences: Therefore the king said unto Shimei, Thou shalt not die. And the king sware unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Saa7oola na7ai Mafibosheeti kawuwaa mokkanau duge wodhdhiis. Kawoi biido gallassaappe doommidi, i sarotettan guyye simmiyo gallassi gakkanaassikka, Mafibosheeti ba tohuwaa meeccibeenna; ba buuchchaa qanxxibeenna; qassi ba maayuwaakka meeccibeenna.

English Sentences: And Mephibosheth the son of Saul came down to meet the king, and had neither dressed his feet, nor trimmed his beard, nor washed his clothes, from the day the king departed until the day he came again in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mafibosheeti kawuwaara gaittanau Yerusalaameppe yiido wode, kawoi a, "Mafibosheetaa, neeni tanaara aissi babeikkii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, when he was come to Jerusalem to meet the king, that the king said unto him, Wherefore wentest not thou with me, Mephibosheth?
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin i, "Ta godau kawuwau, taani ne ashkkarai sila gidiyo gishshau, Taani toggada kawuwaara baanaadan ta hariyaa koora yaagaas. SHin ta ashkkarai Xiibi tana cimmiis;

English Sentences: And he answered, My lord, O king, my servant deceived me: for thy servant said, I will saddle me an ass, that I may ride thereon, and go to the king; because thy servant is lame.
Wolaitta Sentences: cimmidi tana ne ashkkaraa ta godaassi kawuwaassi zigiriis. Neeni ta godai kawoi Xoossaa kiitanchchaa mala; hegaa gishshau, nena ufaissiyaabaa ootta.

English Sentences: And he hath slandered thy servant unto my lord the king; but my lord the king is as an angel of God: do therefore what is good in thine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawaa aawaa asai ubbai harabaa gidennan, ta godai kawoi beni woranau bessiyo asa; shin taani ne ashkkarai ne masoofiyaappe miyaageetuura maanaadan neeni taayyo sohuwaa immadasa. Yaatin, taani hagaappe aadhdhiyaabaa kawuwaa oichchanau taayyo aiba maati de7ii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For all of my father's house were but dead men before my lord the king: yet didst thou set thy servant among them that did eat at thine own table. What right therefore have I yet to cry any more unto the king?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi a, "Neeni darobaa haasayanau koshshenna. Neeninne Xiibi gadiyaa shaakki ekkana mala taani azazais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto him, Why speakest thou any more of thy matters? I have said, Thou and Ziba divide the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mafibosheeti kawuwaa, "Ta godai kawoi saro so simmaappe attin, ubbabaakka Xiibi ekko" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Mephibosheth said unto the king, Yea, let him take all, forasmuch as my lord the king is come again in peace unto his own house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadiyaa Barzzillaayi kawuwaara issippe Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnanaunne yaappe a moissanau Rogaliima giyoosaappe yiis.

English Sentences: And Barzillai the Gileadite came down from Rogelim, and went over Jordan with the king, to conduct him over Jordan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barzzillaayi laittai hosppun tammaa gidido cima asa. I daro dure asa gidiyo gishshau, kawoi Maahinaima kataman de7iyo wode, kawuwaassi koshshiyaabaa immiis.

English Sentences: Now Barzillai was a very aged man, even fourscore years old: and he had provided the king of sustenance while he lay at Mahanaim; for he was a very great man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Barzzillaaya, "Neeni tanaara Yerusalaame hindda; taani nena yan koshshiyaabaa immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto Barzillai, Come thou over with me, and I will feed thee with me in Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Barzzillaayi kawuwaa, "Taani hagaappe sinttan daro laittaa de7ikke; yaatin, taani kawuwaara Yerusalaame aibissi boo?

English Sentences: And Barzillai said unto the king, How long have I to live, that I should go up with the king unto Jerusalem?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha77i hosppun tammu laitta asa; taani ha77i iitaanne lo77uwaa shaakkada eranau danddayiyaanaa? Taani ne ashkkarai ta miyoobaanne uyiyoobaa mal77uwaa masuhuwaa shaakkada eranau danddayiyaanaa? Attumaageetinne maccaageeti yexxiyo yettaa taani siyanau danddayiyaanaa? Yaatin, taani ne ashkkarai ta godau kawuwau aibissi gujo tooho gidoo?

English Sentences: I am this day fourscore years old: and can I discern between good and evil? can thy servant taste what I eat or what I drink? can I hear any more the voice of singing men and singing women? wherefore then should thy servant be yet a burden unto my lord the king?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkarai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnada nena guuttaa moissana. SHin kawoi taayyo hegaadan kushe zaaranau aibissi koshshii?

English Sentences: Thy servant will go a little way over Jordan with the king: and why should the king recompense it me with such a reward?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta aawaanne ta aayee duufuwaa matan ta kataman haiqqana mala simmais. Ta na7ai Kimihaami hageeho; ta godaara kawuwaara issippe i bo; nena ufaissiyaabaa neeni ayyo ootta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Let thy servant, I pray thee, turn back again, that I may die in mine own city, and be buried by the grave of my father and of my mother. But behold thy servant Chimham; let him go over with my lord the king; and do to him what shall seem good unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin kawoi, "Kimihaami tanaara pinno; nena ufaissiyaabaa taani ayyo oottana. Qassi neeni tana oichchiyoobaa aibanne taani neeyyo oottana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the king answered, Chimham shall go over with me, and I will do to him that which shall seem good unto thee: and whatsoever thou shalt require of me, that will I do for thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, asai ubbai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniis; kawoikka pinniis. Pinnidi Barzzillaaya yeridi anjjiis; yaatin, Barzzillaayi ba soo simmiis.

English Sentences: And all the people went over Jordan. And when the king was come over, the king kissed Barzillai, and blessed him; and he returned unto his own place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi pinnidi Gelggala biyo wode, Kimihaamikka aara issippe biis. Yihudaa olanchchati ubbatinne Israa7eela olanchchatuppe baggati kawuwaara issippe biidosona.

English Sentences: Then the king went on to Gilgal, and Chimham went on with him: and all the people of Judah conducted the king, and also half the people of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eelati ubbai kawuwaakko biidi, "Nu ishantti Yihudaa asati kawuwaanne a so asaa aibissi wuuqqidonaa? Qassi a asaa ubbaara issippe Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa aibissi pinttidonaa?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, all the men of Israel came to the king, and said unto the king, Why have our brethren the men of Judah stolen thee away, and have brought the king, and his household, and all David's men with him, over Jordan?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yihudaa asati ubbai Israa7eelata, "Kawoi nuuyyo mata dabbo gidiyo gishshau, nuuni hagaa oottida; yaatin, intte hegau aibissi hanqqetteetii? Nuuni kawuwaa qumaappe aibakko miidoniiyye? Woikko nuuni appe aibakko nuuyyo ekkidoniiyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And all the men of Judah answered the men of Israel, Because the king is near of kin to us: wherefore then be ye angry for this matter? have we eaten at all of the king's cost? or hath he given us any gift?
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asati Yihudaa asata, "Kawuwaappe tammu kushee nuna gattees; hegaa gishshau, Daawita achchan nuuyyo intteppe aaro maatai de7ees! Yaatin, intte nuna aibissi karidetii? Nu kawuwaa guyye zaaridi ehaanau kasetidi haasayidai nuna gidokkonii?" yaagidosona. SHin Israa7eela asatuppe Yihudaa asati haasayaa keehippe wolqqanttidosona.

English Sentences: And the men of Israel answered the men of Judah, and said, We have ten parts in the king, and we have also more right in David than ye: why then did ye despise us, that our advice should not be first had in bringing back our king? And the words of the men of Judah were fiercer than the words of the men of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biniyaama zare gidiya Biikira na7ai SHebaa7a giyo issi shori bainna bitanee yan de7ees. He bitanee malkkataa punnidi, "Nuuni Daawitaara ekkiyo saami baawa! Isseya na7aara nuuni laattanabai baawa! Israa7eela asatoo, ubbaikka intte soo intte soo gelite!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there happened to be there a man of Belial, whose name was Sheba, the son of Bichri, a Benjamite: and he blew a trumpet, and said, We have no part in David, neither have we inheritance in the son of Jesse: every man to his tents, O Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Israa7eela asati ubbai Daawita aggidi, Biikira na7aa SHebaa7aara biidosona. SHin Yihudaa asati ammanettidi, Yorddaanoosappe Yerusalaame gakkanaashin, bantta kawuwaa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: So every man of Israel went up from after David, and followed Sheba the son of Bichri: but the men of Judah clave unto their king, from Jordan even to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti ba soo Yerusalaame simmido wode, kawo keettaa naaganau ashshido tammu baakkota ekki efiidi, issi keettan naagissi wottiis; etayyo koshshiyaabaa immiis; shin i etaara aqibeenna. Eti he keettan naagettidi, bantta haiquwaa gallassai gakkanaassi am77edan de7idosona.

English Sentences: And David came to his house at Jerusalem; and the king took the ten women his concubines, whom he had left to keep the house, and put them in ward, and fed them, but went not in unto them. So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan kawoi Amaasa, "Yihudaa asaa ubbaa heezzu gallassan taayyo xeesada shiishsha; yaatada neenikka ne huuphen etaara shiiqa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then said the king to Amasa, Assemble me the men of Judah within three days, and be thou here present.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Amaasi Yihudaa asata xeesanau biis; shin kawoi ayyo keerido gallassaappe gam77iis.

English Sentences: So Amasa went to assemble the men of Judah: but he tarried longer than the set time which he had appointed him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Abishaaya, "Ha77i Biikira na7aa SHebaa7i Abeseloomaagaappekka aattidi nuna qohana. Ne godaa ashkkarata ekkada neeni a paanaa kaalla. Hegee xayikko, i gimbbettida katamata demmidi nuuppe kessi ekkana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said to Abishai, Now shall Sheba the son of Bichri do us more harm than did Absalom: take thou thy lord's servants, and pursue after him, lest he get him fenced cities, and escape us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yoo7aaba asati, kawuwaa naagiyaageetinne mino olanchchati ubbai Abishaayaara Biikira na7aa SHebaa7a paanaa kaallanau Yerusalaameppe kiyidi biidosona.

English Sentences: And there went out after him Joab's men, and the Cherethites, and the Pelethites, and all the mighty men: and they went out of Jerusalem, to pursue after Sheba the son of Bichri.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biidi Gabaa7oonan de7iya wogga zaallaa gakkiyo wode, Amaasi etaara gaittanau yiis; Yoo7aabi olaa maayuwaa maayi uttiis; ba xeessan bisuwaa shoohuwaara aatti wottido qabattuwaa gixxiis. I sinttaukko tanggishin, he bisoi shoohuwaappe kessi ekkidi wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: When they were at the great stone which is in Gibeon, Amasa went before them. And Joab's garment that he had put on was girded unto him, and upon it a girdle with a sword fastened upon his loins in the sheath thereof; and as he went forth it fell out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi Amaasa, "Ta ishau, neeni saro de7ai?" yaagiis; yaagidi Yoo7aabi Amaasa yeranau ba ushachcha kushiyan a buuchchaa oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And Joab said to Amasa, Art thou in health, my brother? And Joab took Amasa by the beard with the right hand to kiss him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Amaasi Yoo7aaba haddirssa kushiyan de7iya bisuwaa be7ibeenna; hegaa gishshau, appe naagettibeenna. Yoo7aabi a uluwaa caddidi, a maracciyaa biittan zaaziis; naa77anttuwaa cadettennankka Amaasi sohuwaara haiqqi bayiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yoo7aabinne a ishaa Abishaayi Biikira na7aa SHebaa7a paanaa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: But Amasa took no heed to the sword that was in Joab's hand: so he smote him therewith in the fifth rib, and shed out his bowels to the ground, and struck him not again; and he died. So Joab and Abishai his brother pursued after Sheba the son of Bichri.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aaba asatuppe issoi Amaasa ahaa matan eqqidi, "Yoo7aaba dosiyaageenne Daawitabaa gidiyaagee ooninne Yoo7aaba kaallo" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And one of Joab's men stood by him, and said, He that favoureth Joab, and he that is for David, let him go after Joab.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amaasi ogiyaa giddo ginan kunddidi, ba suuttan moorettidi zin77iis. Olanchchati ubbai yiidi, he sohuwan eqqidoogaa he bitanee be7iis; be7idosaarakka Amaasa ahaa ogiyaappe gaxi shooqau goochchi yeggidi, a bolli maayuwaa oliis.

English Sentences: And Amasa wallowed in blood in the midst of the highway. And when the man saw that all the people stood still, he removed Amasa out of the highway into the field, and cast a cloth upon him, when he saw that every one that came by him stood still.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amaasa ogiyaappe diggidoogaappe guyyiyan, Biikira na7aa SHebaa7a paanaa kaallanau olanchchati ubbai Yoo7aabaara biidosona.

English Sentences: When he was removed out of the highway, all the people went on after Joab, to pursue after Sheba the son of Bichri.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHebaa7i Israa7eela zaretu ubbaa biittaara kanttidi, Aabeeli-Beetimaa7ika giyo katamaa gakkiis. Biikiratu biittaara kanttishin, asai ubbai shiiqidi a kaalliis.

English Sentences: And he went through all the tribes of Israel unto Abel, and to Bethmaachah, and all the Berites: and they were gathered together, and went also after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabaara de7iya asati ubbai gakkidi, SHebaa7a Aabeeli-Beetimaa7ika kataman yuuyi aadhdhidi dooddidosona. Eti katamaa gimbbiyan zemppissidi biittaa dooridosona. Qassi Yoo7aabaara de7iya asati ubbai gimbbiyaa qolanau bookkoosona. Eti bookkishin,

English Sentences: And they came and besieged him in Abel of Bethmaachah, and they cast up a bank against the city, and it stood in the trench: and all the people that were with Joab battered the wall, to throw it down.
Wolaitta Sentences: katamaappe issi eranchcha mishiriyaa eta xeesada, "Siyite! Siyite! Biidi, Yoo7aaba xeegite. Taani ayyo yootiyoobai de7ees" yaagaasu. Yaagin i mishireekko bin a,

English Sentences: Then cried a wise woman out of the city, Hear, hear; say, I pray you, unto Joab, Come near hither, that I may speak with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni Yoo7aabee?" yaagada oichchaasu. Oichchin i, "Ee, tana" yaagiis. Mishiriyaa a, "Taani ne ashkkariyaa giyoobaa siya" yaagaasu. Yaagin Yoo7aabi, "Taani siyais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come near unto her, the woman said, Art thou Joab? And he answered, I am he. Then she said unto him, Hear the words of thine handmaid. And he answered, I do hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa Yoo7aaba, "Beni wode asai Aabeela katamaappe ne oishau zaaruwaa demma yaagees; hegan yohoi wurees.

English Sentences: Then she spake, saying, They were wont to speak in old time, saying, They shall surely ask counsel at Abel: and so they ended the matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela giddon saro de7iya ammanettiya asi nuna. Israa7eela biittan de7iya aaye katamaa neeni bashshanau malaasa. Neeni GODAA buzo biittaa aibissi xaissanau koyai?" yaagada haasayaasu.

English Sentences: I am one of them that are peaceable and faithful in Israel: thou seekest to destroy a city and a mother in Israel: why wilt thou swallow up the inheritance of the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Yoo7aabi o, "Hegee taappe haakko! Bashshiyoogee woikko xaissiyoogee taappe haakko!

English Sentences: And Joab answered and said, Far be it, far be it from me, that I should swallow up or destroy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohoi hegaa gidenna; Efireema gezziyaappe Biikira na7aa SHebaa7a giyo issi bitanee Kawuwaa Daawita bolli ba kushiyaa denttiis. He bitaniyaa taayyo sheedhdhite; yaatikko, taani katamaappe baana" yaagiis. Yaagin mishiriyaa Yoo7aaba, "A huuphee gimbbiyaa xeeraara neeyyo olettana" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: The matter is not so: but a man of mount Ephraim, Sheba the son of Bichri by name, hath lifted up his hand against the king, even against David: deliver him only, and I will depart from the city. And the woman said unto Joab, Behold, his head shall be thrown to thee over the wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, mishiriyaa ba era zoriyaara asaa ubbaakko baasu. Hegaa gishshau, asai Biikira na7aa SHebaa7a qooriyaappe muucidi, huuphiyaa Yoo7aabayyo oliis. Yaatin, Yoo7aabi malkkataa punniis; punnin asai ubbai katamaappe kiyidi, ba soo ba soo biis; bin Yoo7aabi kawuwaakko Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: Then the woman went unto all the people in her wisdom. And they cut off the head of Sheba the son of Bichri, and cast it out to Joab. And he blew a trumpet, and they retired from the city, every man to his tent. And Joab returned to Jerusalem unto the king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi Israa7eela olanchchatu ubbaayyo gadaawaa; Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi Daawita naagiya olanchchatu halaqaa.

English Sentences: Now Joab was over all the host of Israel: and Benaiah the son of Jehoiada was over the Cherethites and over the Pelethites:
Wolaitta Sentences: Adooniraami wolqqan coo ootissiyoogeetu halaqaa; Ahiluuda na7ai Yoosaafixi hanidabaa xaafiyaagaa.

English Sentences: And Adoram was over the tribute: and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder:
Wolaitta Sentences: Suusi waanna xaafe; Xaadooqinne Abiyaataari qeeseta.

English Sentences: And Sheva was scribe: and Zadok and Abiathar were the priests:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7iira katamaa asa gidiya Irikka Daawitayyo qeese.

English Sentences: And Ira also the Jairite was a chief ruler about David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti kawotido wode, heezzu laitta kumettaa biittai koshatiis. Hegaa gishshau, Daawiti GODAA oichchiis; oichchin GODAI a, "Hegee hanidoogee Saa7oola asai gussido suuttaa gishshaassa; aissi giikko, i Gabaa7oona asata woriis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then there was a famine in the days of David three years, year after year; and David enquired of the LORD. And the LORD answered, It is for Saul, and for his bloody house, because he slew the Gibeonites.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, kawoi Gabaa7oona asata xeesidi haasayissiis. Gabaa7oona asati Israa7eela zare gidokkona; eti Amoore biittaa asatu atettata. Israa7eelati eta ashshanau etaara caaqettidosona; shin Saa7ooli Israa7eelayyoonne Yihudaayyo mishettido gishshau, eta ubbaara xaissanau doommiis.

English Sentences: And the king called the Gibeonites, and said unto them; (now the Gibeonites were not of the children of Israel, but of the remnant of the Amorites; and the children of Israel had sworn unto them: and Saul sought to slay them in his zeal to the children of Israel and Judah.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Gabaa7oona asata, "Taani intteyyo ai oottoo? GODAA buzo biittaa intte anjjana mala, taani intteyyo ai kaasoo?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore David said unto the Gibeonites, What shall I do for you? and wherewith shall I make the atonement, that ye may bless the inheritance of the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Gabaa7oona asati zaaridi kawuwaa, "Nuuppenne Saa7oolappe gidduwan, woikko nuuppenne Saa7oola keettaa asaappe gidduwan de7iya yohoi worqqa woikko bira yoho gidenna; qassi nuuni Israa7eela giddon issi uraanne woranau nuuyyo maati baawa" yaagidosona. Yaagin Daawiti eta, "Yaatin, taani intteyyo ai oottanau koyeetii?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And the Gibeonites said unto him, We will have no silver nor gold of Saul, nor of his house; neither for us shalt thou kill any man in Israel. And he said, What ye shall say, that will I do for you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin eti kawuwaa, "Saa7ooli nuna xaissiis; nuuppe ai asinne Israa7eela zawan awaaninne paxa attennaadan maqettiis.

English Sentences: And they answered the king, The man that consumed us, and that devised against us that we should be destroyed from remaining in any of the coasts of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Saa7oola yaraappe laappun attuma asata nuuyyo aattada imma; GODAI dooridi kawoyido Saa7oola kataman Gib77an GODAA sinttan nuuni eta kaqqana" yaagidosona. Yaagin kawoi eta, "Taani eta intteyyo aattada immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Let seven men of his sons be delivered unto us, and we will hang them up unto the LORD in Gibeah of Saul, whom the LORD did choose. And the king said, I will give them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola na7ai Yonaataaninne Daawiti GODAA sinttan caaqqido caaquwaa gishshau, Saa7oola na7aa Yonaataana na7aa Mafibosheeta kawoi ashshiis.

English Sentences: But the king spared Mephibosheth, the son of Jonathan the son of Saul, because of the LORD's oath that was between them, between David and Jonathan the son of Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Daawiti Aaya na7iyaa Rixifa Saa7oolayyo yelido naa77u attuma naata, Armmoonanne Mafibosheeta, qassi Saa7oola na7iyaa Meraaba Mahoola katamaappe yiida Barzzillaaya na7aa Adirii7eelayyo yelido ichchashu naata ekkiis.

English Sentences: But the king took the two sons of Rizpah the daughter of Aiah, whom she bare unto Saul, Armoni and Mephibosheth; and the five sons of Michal the daughter of Saul, whom she brought up for Adriel the son of Barzillai the Meholathite:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ekkidi Gabaa7oona asatuyyo aattidi immiis; immin eti eta GODAA sinttan deriyaa huuphiyan kaqqidosona; laappunatikka issippe haiqqidosona; katta cahan, banggaa cahai doommiyo wodiyan eta woridosona.

English Sentences: And he delivered them into the hands of the Gibeonites, and they hanged them in the hill before the LORD: and they fell all seven together, and were put to death in the days of harvest, in the first days, in the beginning of barley harvest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaya na7iyaa Rixifa maaqiyaa ekkada, zaallaa bolli baayyo hiixxaasu; hiixxada kattaa cakkiyo aginai doommiyo gallassaappe biidi ahatu bolli irai saluwaappe wodhdhana gakkanaashin, gallassi saluwaa kafoti woikko qammi sa7aa do7ati bochchennaadan naagaasu.

English Sentences: And Rizpah the daughter of Aiah took sackcloth, and spread it for her upon the rock, from the beginning of harvest until water dropped upon them out of heaven, and suffered neither the birds of the air to rest on them by day, nor the beasts of the field by night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola baakkiyaa, Aaya na7iyaa Rixifa oottidoogee Daawitayyo odettiis.

English Sentences: And it was told David what Rizpah the daughter of Aiah, the concubine of Saul, had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Odettin Daawiti biidi, Saa7oola meqettaanne a na7aa Yonaataana meqettaa Gala7aaden de7iya Yaabeesha katamaa asatuppe ekkiis. Pilisxxeema asati Saa7oolanne a naata Gilbboo7a deriyan woridi, Beetishaana gutaran kaqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, he gutaraappe Gala7aaden de7iya Yaabeesha asati qosan ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And David went and took the bones of Saul and the bones of Jonathan his son from the men of Jabeshgilead, which had stolen them from the street of Bethshan, where the Philistines had hanged them, when the Philistines had slain Saul in Gilboa:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Saa7oola meqettaanne a na7aa Yonaataana meqettaa he sohuwaappe ehiis; qassi kaqettida laappun asatu meqettaakka shiishshidosona.

English Sentences: And he brought up from thence the bones of Saul and the bones of Jonathan his son; and they gathered the bones of them that were hanged.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oola meqettaanne a na7aa Yonaataana meqettaa Biniyaama biittan Xelaa7a kataman de7iya a aawaa Qiisa duufuwan moogidosona. Kawoi azazidobaa ubbaa eti polidosona; hegaappe guyyiyan, eti he biittaayyo woossido woosaa Xoossai siyiis.

English Sentences: And the bones of Saul and Jonathan his son buried they in the country of Benjamin in Zelah, in the sepulchre of Kish his father: and they performed all that the king commanded. And after that God was intreated for the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pilisxxeema asatuuranne Israa7eela asatuura naa77anttuwaakka olai denddiis; denddin Daawiti ba asatuura biis. Pilisxxeematuura olettidi Daawiti daafuriis.

English Sentences: Moreover the Philistines had yet war again with Israel; and David went down, and his servants with him, and fought against the Philistines: and David waxed faint.
Wolaitta Sentences: Adussa mino asatu yaraappe gidiya Yishibibanooba giyo issi bitanee de7ees; i oiqqido toorai heezzu kilo giraamenne baggaa deexxiya, nahaasiyaa giyo birataappe qoxettidaagaa; i ooratta bisuwaa gixxi uttiis. Yaanidaagee "Taani Daawita worana" giis;

English Sentences: And Ishbibenob, which was of the sons of the giant, the weight of whose spear weighed three hundred shekels of brass in weight, he being girded with a new sword, thought to have slain David.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin Xaruuyi na7ai Abishaayi Daawita ashshiis; Pilisxxeemiyaa shocidi woriis. Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawita asati Daawita, "Israa7eela xomppee to7ennaadan neeni naa77antto mulekka nunaara olau baakka" yaagidi caaqqidosona.

English Sentences: But Abishai the son of Zeruiah succoured him, and smote the Philistine, and killed him. Then the men of David sware unto him, saying, Thou shalt go no more out with us to battle, that thou quench not the light of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Gooba giyo sohuwan Pilisxxeema asatuura olai olettiis; olettin Huushappe yiida Sibbakaayi adussa mino asatu yaraappe gidiya Saafa woriis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass after this, that there was again a battle with the Philistines at Gob: then Sibbechai the Hushathite slew Saph, which was of the sons of the giant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka he sohuwan Pilisxxeema asatuura hara olai olettiis; olettin Beetaliheemeppe yiida Yaa7iira na7ai Elihanaani, tooraa toomai shimainniyaa wonddarashiyaa keeniyo, Gaate katamaappe yiida Gooliyaada woriis.

English Sentences: And there was again a battle in Gob with the Philistines, where Elhanan the son of Jaareoregim, a Bethlehemite, slew the brother of Goliath the Gittite, the staff of whose spear was like a weaver's beam.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka Gaate kataman hara olai olettiis. He sohuwan issi wogga adussa bitanee de7ees. He bitaniyaayyo issi issi kushiyan usuppun biradhdheti, issi issi tohuwankka usuppun biradhdheti, muleera laatamanne oiddu biradhdheti de7oosona. Ikka adussa mino asatu yaraappe gidiya asa.

English Sentences: And there was yet a battle in Gath, where was a man of great stature, that had on every hand six fingers, and on every foot six toes, four and twenty in number; and he also was born to the giant.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee Israa7eela naassido wode, Daawita ishaa SHaama na7ai Yonaataani a woriis.

English Sentences: And when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimeah the brother of David slew him.
Wolaitta Sentences: He oiddati Gaate kataman de7iya adussa mino asatu yarata. Eta Daawitinne a asati woridosona.

English Sentences: These four were born to the giant in Gath, and fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI a morkketu ubbaa kushiyaappenne Saa7oola kushiyaappe ashshido gallassi Daawiti GODAASSI ha yettaa yexxiis.

English Sentences: And David spake unto the LORD the words of this song in the day that the LORD had delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI tau wogga zaallaa; taani olaappe naagettiyo miixaa; i tana ashshiyaagaa.

English Sentences: And he said, The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Xoossai taani akko baqatiyo ta wogga zaallaa. I ta gonddalliyaa; i tana ashshiya wolqqaamaa. I taani qosetta attiyo soho; i tana makkalanchcha asatuppe ashshees.

English Sentences: The God of my rock; in him will I trust: he is my shield, and the horn of my salvation, my high tower, and my refuge, my saviour; thou savest me from violence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galatai bessiyo GODAA taani xeesais; i ta morkketuppe tana ashshees.

English Sentences: I will call on the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Haiquwaa beetai ta heeran sirimettees; bashshai di7odan tana muukkiis.

English Sentences: When the waves of death compassed me, the floods of ungodly men made me afraid;
Wolaitta Sentences: Duufuwaa wodoroi tana qachchana hanees; haiqoi piredan tana oiqqiis.

English Sentences: The sorrows of hell compassed me about; the snares of death prevented me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana metoi iissin GODAA xeesaas; Tana maadda gaada ta Xoossaayyo waassaas. I ba Beeta Maqidasiyan ta cenggurssaa siyiis; taani waassido waasoi a haittan wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried to my God: and he did hear my voice out of his temple, and my cry did enter into his ears.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wodhdhin Xoossai hanqqettido gishshau, biittai yaaqiyaaqidi qaaxxiis; deretu xaphoi gajigajidi kokkoriis.

English Sentences: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations of heaven moved and shook, because he was wroth.
Wolaitta Sentences: A siiriyaappe hanqquwaa cuwai cuwattiis; a doonaappe miya tamaa lacoinne xuuggiya bonqqoi kiyiis.

English Sentences: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaa i phalqqidi, duge wodhdhiis. He wode a gediyaappe garssaara sikkida shaarai de7ees.

English Sentences: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; and darkness was under his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qefiyaara de7iya kiitanchchatun, kiruubetun uttidi paalliis; carkkuwaa qefiyaa bollan beettiis.

English Sentences: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: and he was seen upon the wings of the wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bana xuman kammiis; a dunkkaanee iraara sikkida shaaraa.

English Sentences: And he made darkness pavilions round about him, dark waters, and thick clouds of the skies.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sinttan de7iya gita poo7uwaappe tamaa lacoi kiyiis.

English Sentences: Through the brightness before him were coals of fire kindled.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi GODAI dadaadan saluwaappe guummiis. Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai ba cenggurssaa sissiis.

English Sentences: The LORD thundered from heaven, and the most High uttered his voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba wonddafiyaa zubbiyaa yeddidi, ba morkketa laaliis. Wolqqanttaa poo7uwaa kiittidi, eta yedettiis.

English Sentences: And he sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and discomfited them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI seerido wodenne hanqqettidi peenuqido wode, abbaa haattai zin77ido biittai beettiis. Qassi sa7aa baasoikka qoncciis.

English Sentences: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the LORD, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI bollappe kushiyaa duge yeddidi, tana oiqqiis; ciimma haattaappe tana kessiis.

English Sentences: He sent from above, he took me; he drew me out of many waters;
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana ta wolqqaama morkkiyaappenne tana ixxiyaageetuppe ashshiis; aissi giikko, eti taayyo keehi daro wolqqaama.

English Sentences: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them that hated me: for they were too strong for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta waayiyaa gallassi eti ta bolli denddidosona; shin GODAI tana zemppissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana aaho sohuwaa kessiis; tanan ufaittido gishshau, tana ashshiis.

English Sentences: He brought me forth also into a large place: he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta xillotettaadan GODAI tau qanxxiis; ta kushiyaa geeshshatettaadan i tau zaariis.

English Sentences: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness: according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA ogiyaa kaallaas; taani ta Xoossaa aggada wora babeikke.

English Sentences: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a higgiyaa ubbaa naagaas; a wogaa poliyoogaa aggabeikke.

English Sentences: For all his judgments were before me: and as for his statutes, I did not depart from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a sinttan suure de7aas; taani tana nagarappe naagaas.

English Sentences: I was also upright before him, and have kept myself from mine iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI tau ta xillotettaadaaninne ta geeshshatettaadan zaariis.

English Sentences: Therefore the LORD hath recompensed me according to my righteousness; according to my cleanness in his eye sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, ammanettiyaageetuyyo neeni ammanettiyaagaa; suuretuyyo neenikka suure.

English Sentences: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful, and with the upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshshatuyyo neenikka geeshsha; shin geellatuyyo neeni cincca.

English Sentences: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttana ziqqissiyaageeta ashshaasa; shin banttana xoqqissiyaageeta ziqqissanau neeni eta xeellaasa.

English Sentences: And the afflicted people thou wilt save: but thine eyes are upon the haughty, that thou mayest bring them down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta xomppee nena; GODAI poo7issin, ta xumai kichchees.

English Sentences: For thou art my lamp, O LORD: and the LORD will lighten my darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne maaduwan taani ta morkke olanchchatu bolli woraajjais; ta Xoossan taani eta miixaa xeeraara guppa aadhdhais.

English Sentences: For by thee I have run through a troop: by my God have I leaped over a wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossaa ogee suure. GODAA qaalai ammanettiyaagaa. Akko baqatiya ubbatussi i gonddalle.

English Sentences: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAPPE attin, hara xoossi baawa; nu Xoossaappe attin, hara wogga zaalli baawa.

English Sentences: For who is God, save the LORD? and who is a rock, save our God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo wolqqaa immiyaageenne ta ogiyaa saro oottiyaagee Xoossaattennee.

English Sentences: God is my strength and power: and he maketh my way perfect.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta gediyaa genessaa gediyaadan minttees. Tana xoqqa sohotun sarotettan wottees.

English Sentences: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta kushiyaa olaa meezeyees; hegaa gishshau, taani ta qesiyan nahaasiyaa giyo birataa wonddafiyaa dafada dukkais.

English Sentences: He teacheth my hands to war; so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tana ashshiya ne gonddalliyaa neeni taayyo immadasa; ne lo77o ohettai tana gitayees.

English Sentences: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy gentleness hath made me great.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hemettiyoosaa aassaasa; hegaa gishshau, ta tohoi harchchibeenna.

English Sentences: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me; so that my feet did not slip.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketa taani yedettada mentterettaas; taani eta xaissennan de7aidda guyye simmabeikke.

English Sentences: I have pursued mine enemies, and destroyed them; and turned not again until I had consumed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta naa77antto denddennaadan shocaas; eti ta tohuwan wullidosona.

English Sentences: And I have consumed them, and wounded them, that they could not arise: yea, they are fallen under my feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olau tana wolqqaa gixissadasa; tanaara gaaddetiyaageeta taayyo gulbbatissadasa.

English Sentences: For thou hast girded me with strength to battle: them that rose up against me hast thou subdued under me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketa ta sinttappe guyye baqatissadasa; tana ixxiyaageeta taani xaissaas.

English Sentences: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies, that I might destroy them that hate me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttana maaddiyaabaa koyidosona; shin ooninne eta ashshibeenna. GODAAKKA eti xeesidosona; shin i etau koyibeenna.

English Sentences: They looked, but there was none to save; even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta baanadan liiqissaas; ogiyan de7iya urqqaadankka eta dirxxerettada yedhdhaas.

English Sentences: Then did I beat them as small as the dust of the earth, I did stamp them as the mire of the street, and did spread them abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta asaa makkalaappe tana ashshadasa. Kawotettatu bolli sunttada, tana naagadasa; taani erenna asai tau haarettiis.

English Sentences: Thou also hast delivered me from the strivings of my people, thou hast kept me to be head of the heathen: a people which I knew not shall serve me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Allaga dere asaikka ta sinttan lahottees. Eti ta woriyaa siyidi, tau azazettoosona.

English Sentences: Strangers shall submit themselves unto me: as soon as they hear, they shall be obedient unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wozanaa kahaa bayoosona. Bantta naagettiyo miixaappe kokkoriiddi yoosona.

English Sentences: Strangers shall fade away, and they shall be afraid out of their close places.
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI de7ees! Xoossai, ta wogga zaallai galatetto. Xoossai, tana ashshiya zaallai, xoqqu xoqqu go.

English Sentences: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and exalted be the God of the rock of my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta haluwaa kessiya Xoossaa; kawotettata taappe garssaara wottiyaagaa.

English Sentences: It is God that avengeth me, and that bringeth down the people under me,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketuppe tana kessi ekkiyaagaa. Abeet GODAU, neeni tanaara gaaddetiyaageetu bollan tana xoqqu xoqqu oottaasa. Makkalanchcha asatuppe neeni tana ashshaasa.

English Sentences: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies: thou also hast lifted me up on high above them that rose up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani nena kawotettatu giddon galatana; taani ne sunttaakka sabbana.

English Sentences: Therefore I will give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and I will sing praises unto thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossai ba kawuwaassi xoonuwaa bollan xoonuwaa immees. Ba tiyidoogaassi, Daawitassinne a zerettaassi, aggenna siiquwaa merinau bessees" yaagidi yexxiis.

English Sentences: He is the tower of salvation for his king: and sheweth mercy to his anointed, unto David, and to his seed for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti Daawiti wurssettan haasayido qaalata. Isseya na7ai Daawiti haasayees; Xoossai xoqqu xoqqu oottidoogee, Yaaqooba Xoossai tiyidi kawoyidoogee, Israa7eelan lo77o mazamuriyaa kessidaagee hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: Now these be the last words of David. David the son of Jesse said, and the man who was raised up on high, the anointed of the God of Jacob, and the sweet psalmist of Israel, said,
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAA Ayyaanai ta baggaara haasayees; a qaalai ta inxxarssan de7ees.

English Sentences: The Spirit of the LORD spake by me, and his word was in my tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela Xoossai haasayiis; Israa7eela Zaallai tana hagaadan yaagiis; Xillotettan deriyaa haariya kawoi, Xoossaassi yayyiiddi kawotiya kawoi

English Sentences: The God of Israel said, the Rock of Israel spake to me, He that ruleth over men must be just, ruling in the fear of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: shaari bainna guuran doliya xalqqiyaa poo7uwaa mala. He urai irai bukki simmin, biittaappe maataa mokissiya booqalssaa mala yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he shall be as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, even a morning without clouds; as the tender grass springing out of the earth by clear shining after rain.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tumu ta keettaa asai Xoossaa sinttan suure. I tanaara merinaa maachchaa maacettiis; ubbabaikka ha maachchaa giddon giigidinne minnidi uttiis. Xoossai taayyo xoonuwaa immana; qassi taani amottidobaa ubbaa i tumuppe polana.

English Sentences: Although my house be not so with God; yet he hath made with me an everlasting covenant, ordered in all things, and sure: for this is all my salvation, and all my desire, although he make it not to grow.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin iita asati ubbai kushen shiishshanau hanenna agunttatudan wora olettana.

English Sentences: But the sons of Belial shall be all of them as thorns thrust away, because they cannot be taken with hands:
Wolaitta Sentences: Agunttata bochchiya ooninne birataa woikko toora toomaa ba kushiyan oiqqanau koshshees. He agunttati bantta de7iyo sohuwan eexxana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the man that shall touch them must be fenced with iron and the staff of a spear; and they shall be utterly burned with fire in the same place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita asatu minotu sunttai hagaappe kaallidi xaafettiis. Etappe heezzati keehippe erettidaageeta. Heezzatuppe koiroi Taahikimoonappe yiida Yooshebi-Baashebeeta geetettees; i issitoo olan ba tooran hosppun xeetu asaa woriis.

English Sentences: These be the names of the mighty men whom David had: The Tachmonite that sat in the seat, chief among the captains; the same was Adino the Eznite: he lift up his spear against eight hundred, whom he slew at one time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzu mino asatu giddon a kaallidi de7iyaagee Ahoohiyaa Doodo na7aa El77aazara. Issi gallassi inne Daawiti olau shiiqida Pilisxxeemata naassidosona; hegaappe guyyiyan, Israa7eela asai guyye simmiis.

English Sentences: And after him was Eleazar the son of Dodo the Ahohite, one of the three mighty men with David, when they defied the Philistines that were there gathered together to battle, and the men of Israel were gone away:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i ba sohuwan minni eqqidi, a kushee xalalidi, bisuwaara oiqettana gakkanaashin, Pilisxxeema asata shociis. He gallassi GODAI gita xoonuwaa immiis. Olai eqqin, olanchchati El77aazarakko simmidi yiidosona; shin eti haiqqida Pilisxxeematuppe olaa maayuwaa qaaridosonappe attin, harabaa oottibookkona.

English Sentences: He arose, and smote the Philistines until his hand was weary, and his hand clave unto the sword: and the LORD wrought a great victory that day; and the people returned after him only to spoil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Appe kaalliyaagee qassi Haaraarappe yiida Age na7aa SHamma. Issi gallassi Pilisxxeema asati misirai kumi uttido shooqan shiiqidosona; shiiqin Israa7eela asati eta sinttaappe baqatidosona.

English Sentences: And after him was Shammah the son of Agee the Hararite. And the Philistines were gathered together into a troop, where was a piece of ground full of lentiles: and the people fled from the Philistines.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin SHammi shooqau giddo baazzan murttidi eqqidi olettiis. Pilisxxeema asata shocidi dippiyiis. Hegan GODAI wolqqaama xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: But he stood in the midst of the ground, and defended it, and slew the Philistines: and the LORD wrought a great victory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katta cahan hasttamu mino asatuppe heezzati Daawitakko Adulaama katamaa matan de7iya gonggoluwaa biidosona. He wode Pilisxxeema olanchchati Rafaima Wombban shiiqi uttidosona.

English Sentences: And three of the thirty chief went down, and came to David in the harvest time unto the cave of Adullam: and the troop of the Philistines pitched in the valley of Rephaim.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Daawiti qatuwaa giddon de7ees; Pilisxxeema olanchchatu citai qassi Beetaliheemen de7ees.

English Sentences: And David was then in an hold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Bethlehem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti haattaa uyanau amottidi, "Beetaliheeme katamaa penggiyaa lanqqen de7iya pultto haattaappe tana ooni ushshanddeeshsha!" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David longed, and said, Oh that one would give me drink of the water of the well of Bethlehem, which is by the gate!
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin heezzu mino asati Pilisxxeema olanchchatu moottaa kanttidi, Beetaliheeme katamaa penggen de7iya pulttuwaappe haattaa duuqqidi Daawitayyo ehiidosona. SHin i uyennan ixxiis; ixxidi, GODAA sinttan tigidi,

English Sentences: And the three mighty men brake through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Bethlehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David: nevertheless he would not drink thereof, but poured it out unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, hagaa uyanaagee taappe haakko! Ha haattai bantta shemppuwaa shenehoo giidi xalidi biida asatu suuttaa gidennee?" yaagidi uyennan ixxiis. Ha heezzu mino asati hagaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: And he said, Be it far from me, O LORD, that I should do this: is not this the blood of the men that went in jeopardy of their lives? therefore he would not drink it. These things did these three mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaruuyi na7aa Yoo7aaba ishai Abishaayi hasttamatuyyo halaqa; i heezzu xeetu asata ba tooran olidi woriis; yaatidi ikka hara heezzatudan erettiis.

English Sentences: And Abishai, the brother of Joab, the son of Zeruiah, was chief among three. And he lifted up his spear against three hundred, and slew them, and had the name among three.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hasttamatuppe aadhdhidi bonchchettida asa; i etayyo halaqa gidiis. Gidikkonne, i he heezzatu qoodan de7enna.

English Sentences: Was he not most honourable of three? therefore he was their captain: howbeit he attained not unto the first three.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Qabxxi7eelappe yiida Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayikka mino asa. I mino oosota oottiis. I naa77u erettida Moo7aaba asata woriis. Qassi shachchai dariyo issi gallassi ollaa duge gelidi, gaammuwaa woriis.

English Sentences: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man, of Kabzeel, who had done many acts, he slew two lionlike men of Moab: he went down also and slew a lion in the midst of a pit in time of snow:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Gibxxe bitaniyaa issi pomppollaa woriis; Gibxxe bitanee tooraa oiqqiis; shin i dullaa oiqqidi a bolli biis; biidi a kushiyaappe tooraa dafi ekkidi, a tooran a woriis.

English Sentences: And he slew an Egyptian, a goodly man: and the Egyptian had a spear in his hand; but he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoodaahe na7ai Banaayi hageeta oottiis. A sunttaikka he heezzatuugaadan erettiis.

English Sentences: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among three mighty men.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hasttamatu giddon daro bonchchettis; shin i heezzatu qoodan de7enna. Daawiti a bana naagiya olanchchatussi halaqa kessiis.

English Sentences: He was more honourable than the thirty, but he attained not to the first three. And David set him over his guard.
Wolaitta Sentences: He hasttamatu giddon de7iyaageeti: Yoo7aaba ishaa Asaaheela, Beetaliheemeppe yiida Doodo na7aa Elihanaana,

English Sentences: Asahel the brother of Joab was one of the thirty; Elhanan the son of Dodo of Bethlehem,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haroodappe yiida SHammanne Eliiqa,

English Sentences: Shammah the Harodite, Elika the Harodite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Palxxa yara gidiya Heleexa, Taqo7appe yiida Iqqeesha na7aa Ira,

English Sentences: Helez the Paltite, Ira the son of Ikkesh the Tekoite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Anatootappe yiida Abi7eezera, Huushappe yiida Mabunaaya,

English Sentences: Abiezer the Anethothite, Mebunnai the Hushathite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ahooha yara gidiya Xalmmoona,

English Sentences: Zalmon the Ahohite, Maharai the Netophathite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Naxoofappe yiida Maahiraayanne Ba7aana na7aa Heleeba, Biniyaama biittaappe, Gib77appe yiida Ribaaya na7aa Ittaaya,

English Sentences: Heleb the son of Baanah, a Netophathite, Ittai the son of Ribai out of Gibeah of the children of Benjamin,
Wolaitta Sentences: Pir77aatoonappe yiida Banaaya, Ga7aasha Zanggaaraa matappe yiida Hiddaaya,

English Sentences: Benaiah the Pirathonite, Hiddai of the brooks of Gaash,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aarabappe yiida Abi7albboona, Baahiruumappe yiida Azimaaweeta,

English Sentences: Abialbon the Arbathite, Azmaveth the Barhumite,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHa7albboonappe yiida Eliyaahiba, Yaasheena naata, Yonaataana,

English Sentences: Eliahba the Shaalbonite, of the sons of Jashen, Jonathan,
Wolaitta Sentences: Haaraarappe yiida SHamma, Haaraarappe yiida SHaraara na7aa Ahi7aama,

English Sentences: Shammah the Hararite, Ahiam the son of Sharar the Hararite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Maa7ikappe yiida Ahasabaaya na7aa Elifeleexa, Giiloppe yiida Akixoofeela na7aa Elii7aama,

English Sentences: Eliphelet the son of Ahasbai, the son of the Maachathite, Eliam the son of Ahithophel the Gilonite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qarmmeloosappe yiida Hexira, Araba katamaappe yiida Pa7araaya,

English Sentences: Hezrai the Carmelite, Paarai the Arbite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Xooba katamaappe yiida Naataana na7aa Yigi7aala, Gaadappe yiida Baana,

English Sentences: Igal the son of Nathan of Zobah, Bani the Gadite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Amoonappe yiida Xeleqa, Xaruuyi na7aa Yoo7aaba ola miishshaa tookkiya Ba7erootappe yiida Naahiraaya,

English Sentences: Zelek the Ammonite, Nahari the Beerothite, armourbearer to Joab the son of Zeruiah,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yatira yara gidiya Ira, Yatira yara gidiya Gaareebanne

English Sentences: Ira an Ithrite, Gareb an Ithrite,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiitiyaa Ooriyoona. Eti muleera hasttamanne laappuna.

English Sentences: Uriah the Hittite: thirty and seven in all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka GODAA hanqqoi Israa7eela bolli eexxi kiyiis; yaatin, GODAI Daawita eta bolli denttettidi, "Ba; baada Israa7eelanne Yihudaa asaa qooda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And again the anger of the LORD was kindled against Israel, and he moved David against them to say, Go, number Israel and Judah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, kawoi Yoo7aabanne aara de7iya olanchchatu halaqata hagaadan yaagiis; "Israa7eela zaretu giddo Daanappe biidi Berssaabeha gakkanaashin biite; biidi eti aappunakko taani erana mala, Israa7eela asaa qoodite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For the king said to Joab the captain of the host, which was with him, Go now through all the tribes of Israel, from Dan even to Beersheba, and number ye the people, that I may know the number of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yoo7aabi kawuwaa, "GODAI ne Xoossai ha de7iya asaa bolli xeetu kushiyaa gujjo! Hegaa ne aifee, ta godaa kawuwaa aifee be7o! SHin ta godai kawoi aissi hegaa malabaa oottanau koyii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Joab said unto the king, Now the LORD thy God add unto the people, how many soever they be, an hundredfold, and that the eyes of my lord the king may see it: but why doth my lord the king delight in this thing?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kawuwaa qaalai Yoo7aabanne olanchchatu halaqata xooniis. Xoonin eti kawuwaa sinttappe kiyidi, Israa7eela asaa qoodanau biidosona.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding the king's word prevailed against Joab, and against the captains of the host. And Joab and the captains of the host went out from the presence of the king, to number the people of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinnidoogaappe guyyiyan, zanggaaraappe tohossa baggan de7iya Aaro7era kataman uttidosona; hegaappe qassi Gaada kanttidi Yaa7izeera gakkidosona.

English Sentences: And they passed over Jordan, and pitched in Aroer, on the right side of the city that lieth in the midst of the river of Gad, and toward Jazer:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti Gala7aadenne Hiitetu biittan de7iya Qaadeesa biidosona; he sohuwaappe qassi Daana katamaa biidosona; hegaara Sidoona katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: Then they came to Gilead, and to the land of Tahtimhodshi; and they came to Danjaan, and about to Zidon,
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwaappe denddidi, Xiiroosa katamaa qatuwaanne Hiiwetunne Kanaanetu katama ubbaa biidosona. Wurssettan qassi Yihudaa Neegeeban de7iya Berssaabeha katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And came to the strong hold of Tyre, and to all the cities of the Hivites, and of the Canaanites: and they went out to the south of Judah, even to Beersheba.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biittaa ubbaa yuuyiiddi, uddufun aginanne laatamu gallassaa gam77idoogaappe guyyiyan, Yerusalaame katamaa simmidosona.

English Sentences: So when they had gone through all the land, they came to Jerusalem at the end of nine months and twenty days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoo7aabi qoodido asaa qoodaa kawuwaa erissiis: erissidoogaadan Israa7eelan bisuwan olettanau danddayiya hosppun xeetu sha7a; mino olanchchati de7oosona; Yihudan qassi ichchashu xeetu sha7ai de7oosona.

English Sentences: And Joab gave up the sum of the number of the people unto the king: and there were in Israel eight hundred thousand valiant men that drew the sword; and the men of Judah were five hundred thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa qoodidoogaappe guyyiyan, Daawita wozanai shabbarettiis; hegaa gishshau, Daawiti GODAA, "Taani ha oosuwan gita nagaraa oottaas. SHin ha77i abeet GODAU, taani nena woossais; ta mooruwaa, ne ashkkaraa mooruwaa qucca. Taani daro eeyyabaa hanaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David's heart smote him after that he had numbered the people. And David said unto the LORD, I have sinned greatly in that I have done: and now, I beseech thee, O LORD, take away the iniquity of thy servant; for I have done very foolishly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi maallado, Daawiti hiittaappe denddido wode, Daawitassi hananabaa yootiya Gaadakko GODAA qaalai yiis.

English Sentences: For when David was up in the morning, the word of the LORD came unto the prophet Gad, David's seer, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi, "Ba; baada Daawita, GODAI nena, "Taani nena heezzubaappe dooruwaa bessais; taani ne bolli polanau taayyo etappe issuwaa doora" yaagees yaaga" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Go and say unto David, Thus saith the LORD, I offer thee three things; choose thee one of them, that I may do it unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Gaadi Daawitakko biidi, "Heezzu laitti ne biittai koshatanaagaa doorai? Woikko ne morkketi nena yedettishin, heezzu aginaa neeni eta sinttappe baqatanaagaa doorai? Woikko ne biittaa bolli heezzu gallassa boshai yaanaagaa doorai? Ane ha77i qoppa kuuyada, taani tana kiittidaagaayyo zaariyoobaa oda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: So Gad came to David, and told him, and said unto him, Shall seven years of famine come unto thee in thy land? or wilt thou flee three months before thine enemies, while they pursue thee? or that there be three days' pestilence in thy land? now advise, and see what answer I shall return to him that sent me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Daawiti Gaada, "Taani keehippe un77ettaas. GODAA maarotai gita gidiyo gishshau, nuuni ane a kushiyan kunddoos; tana asatu kushiyan kunddissoppa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David said unto Gad, I am in a great strait: let us fall now into the hand of the LORD; for his mercies are great: and let me not fall into the hand of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, maalladoppe biidi ba giido gallassai gakkanaashin, GODAI Israa7eela biittan boshaa kiittiis; kiittin Israa7eela zawan Daanappe biidi Berssaabeha gakkanaashin, laappun tammu sha7u asai haiqqiis.

English Sentences: So the LORD sent a pestilence upon Israel from the morning even to the time appointed: and there died of the people from Dan even to Beersheba seventy thousand men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame katamaa xaissanau kiitanchchai ba kushiyaa yeddido wode, GODAI he gakkida boshau azzaniis; azzanidi asaa shociya kiitanchchaa, "Agga! Hegee gidana!" yaagiis. GODAA kiitanchchai he wode Yaabuusiyaa Ornna audiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: And when the angel stretched out his hand upon Jerusalem to destroy it, the LORD repented him of the evil, and said to the angel that destroyed the people, It is enough: stay now thine hand. And the angel of the LORD was by the threshingplace of Araunah the Jebusite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa shociya kiitanchchaa Daawiti be7ido wode, GODAA, "Be7a! Nagaraa oottidaagee tana; taani mooraas! Ha dorssati, eti ai oottidonaa? Hayyanaa, tananne ta aawaa so asaa neeni qaxxayana mala taani woossais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And David spake unto the LORD when he saw the angel that smote the people, and said, Lo, I have sinned, and I have done wickedly: but these sheep, what have they done? let thine hand, I pray thee, be against me, and against my father's house.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Gaadi Daawitakko yiidi, "Ba; pude Yaabuusiyaa Ornna audiyaa baada, GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa yan gimbba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Gad came that day to David, and said unto him, Go up, rear an altar unto the LORD in the threshingfloor of Araunah the Jebusite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Daawiti GODAI Gaada baggaara azazidoogaadan pude biis.

English Sentences: And David, according to the saying of Gad, went up as the LORD commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ornni duge xeelliyo wode, kawoinne a asati baakko yiyaageeta be7iis; be7idi gaxi kiyidi, ba som77uwaa sa7aa gattidi, kawuwaassi ziggiis.

English Sentences: And Araunah looked, and saw the king and his servants coming on toward him: and Araunah went out, and bowed himself before the king on his face upon the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ziggidi Ornni, "Ta godai kawoi ba ashkkaraakko, taakko aibissi yiidee?" yaagiis. Yaagin Daawiti, "Asaa bollaappe boshai kichchanaadan taani GODAAYYO yarshshiyoosaa gimbbanau, ne audiyaa shammanau yaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Araunah said, Wherefore is my lord the king come to his servant? And David said, To buy the threshingfloor of thee, to build an altar unto the LORD, that the plague may be stayed from the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Ornni, "Ta godai kawoi ba koyidobaa aibanne ekkidi yarshsho! Be7a; xuuggiyo yarshshuwaayyo boorati, eettiyo mittaayyo qassi kattaa qoxxiyo miishshatinne booraa qambbarati hageetihoona.

English Sentences: And Araunah said unto David, Let my lord the king take and offer up what seemeth good unto him: behold, here be oxen for burnt sacrifice, and threshing instruments and other instruments of the oxen for wood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwau, hagaa ubbaa taani Ornni kawuwaayyo immais" yaagiis. Qassikka Ornni kawuwaa, "GODAI ne Xoossai ne yarshshuwaa ekko" yaagiis.

English Sentences: All these things did Araunah, as a king, give unto the king. And Araunah said unto the king, The LORD thy God accept thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kawoi Ornna, "CHii, chii! Taani tumuppe miishshan shammana; aissi giikko, miishsha ekkibeenna xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa taani GODAAYYO, ta Xoossaayyo, yarshshikke" yaagiis. Hegaa gishshau, kawoi audiyaanne boorata Ornnappe ishatamu xaqara biran shammiis.

English Sentences: And the king said unto Araunah, Nay; but I will surely buy it of thee at a price: neither will I offer burnt offerings unto the LORD my God of that which doth cost me nothing. So David bought the threshingfloor and the oxen for fifty shekels of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti he sohuwan yarshshiyoosaa gimbbidi, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne issippetettaa yarshshuwaa GODAAYYO yarshshiis; yaatin, GODAI he biittaa gishshau woosettida woosaa siyidi, boshaa Israa7eelappe diggiis.
